description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technology and application on the power engineering via seminar. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in the area of control engineering.  Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion.  Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習通訊工程領域之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in the area of communications engineering.  Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion.  Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習計算機工程領域之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in the area of  computer engineering.  Renowned researchers and scholars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion.  Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

Data Modeling Using the Entity-Relationship Model --3. Record Storage and Primary File Organizations -4. -The Relational Data Model -5. SQL -6. ER- and ERR-to Relational Mapping -7. Image Restoration ４.Color Image Processing ５. Morphological Image Processing ６. Image Segmentation 7. Object Recognition 8. Wavelet and Multiresolution Processing

description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.en: This course aims to provide a comprehensive introduction to Internet technologies. Unlike traditional courses, it pursues a top-down approach to the topic, starting with the application layer and then describing the transport and network layers, finally covering the physical layer.Among others, this course describes in details the network applications such as Web and Email and network services such as file service provided by Network File Server (NFS) and directory service provided by Domain Name Server(DNS); the design and implementation of client-server computing using Sockets and remote procedure call(RPC) mechanisms; the architecture and design of communication protocols; the operations of the transport layer provided by TCP and UDP; the packet routing layer as provided by IP and routing mechanisms and protocols (RIP, BGP); the physical layer of LANs and media technologies (Ethernet, Token Ring, FDDI, bridging); the physical layer of WANs (modulation, multiplexing, T1) and emergi

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解排隊理論之基本概念及分析方法，並據以分析通訊網路或計算機網路之效能。課程內容包含：(1)排隊理論簡介 (2)相關機率理論 (3)基本排隊模式 (4)各種排隊模式分析 (5)排隊理論應用於各種通訊網路及計算機網路之效能分析。
description.en: This course contains the Introduction of Queueing Theory, Related probability theory, Fundamental Queueing models, Queueing models analysis: M/M/1, M/M/c, M/E/1, M/G/1, G/M/1 etc. This course also contains the performance evaluation of communications networks and computer networks based on the queueing theory.

name.zh: 行動通訊網路原理與實務
name.en: Mobile Telecommunication Networks Principles and Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在增進電機工程研究所學生對行動電話通訊網路工程實務之了解與分析設計之實作能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括： (一) 電信基本概要簡介 (二) 行動電話通訊系統之演進與發展 (三) 蜂巢式行動電話基本網路架構與功能 (四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討 (五) 無線網路之規劃設計與工程實務 (1)信號涵蓋之電腦模擬與路測技術 (2)通話流量與系統容量分析 (3)頻率規劃與干擾研究 (六) 系統優化與網路維運管理實務 (七) 電信公司營運機房與網管中心實地參觀 (八) 射頻規劃之電腦軟體模擬實驗: 在系裡經費許可之前提下提供學生實習網路規劃。
description.en: This course aims to improve EE graduate student's knowledge in mobile telecommunication networks with emphasis on the engineering practice, as well as to train the students to be able to design and analyze the mobile telecommunication networks. The course content includes the following: (1) Fundamentals of Telecommunications (2) Mobile telecom systems evolution and future trend (3) Cellular network structure and functions (4) Taiwan GSM networks case study (5) Wireless networks planning, design and engineering practice 1. RF planning: computer simulation and road test 2. Traffic and capacity analysis 3. Frequency planning and interference study (6) System optimization and network management (7) Site-visiting to Telecomm company's operation center (8) Planning/design simulation using computer software if funding is allowed.

notes: 99年11月初至12底至綜科422實驗室上課

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 面對全球化製造，供應鏈，與運籌管理的日漸普及各行業，如何e化企業是台灣企業界高階決策主管們的當急之務。本課程介紹目前e化管理的企業環境;教導與e化管理在策略，營運，行銷，財務四方面相關議題的理論基礎和管理實務上的應用;訓練學生將e化的觀念和思維融入現有的管理體系，使企業能掌握其產業鏈之最大價值，以創新的e化管理模式，整合企業本身資源，協調上下游廠商的供銷機能，使企業能朝e化與全球化運籌管理邁進，?到永續經營的目的。
description.en: Facing to the globalization of production, supply chain and logistics management of different business types and industries, it is important for top managers to utilize electronic business management. This course introduces current business environment of e-commerce and aims at four main e-business management issues, i.e., strategic, operations, marketing and finance. This course will also train students to corporate electronic management concepts and thinking into current management system, to integrate corporate resources, to coordinate upstream and downstream business partners, and to help business electronic management and globalization logistics management.

description.zh: 敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容:工業組織、人事管理、工廠規劃、成本分析與控制、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現代化企業和組織整合，主要目標是管理面與科技面的創造，以及現代資訊科技管理與企業整合。企業為了追求更高效率與更高效能的價值鏈而快速地轉變成虛擬企業。以階層命令為主的管理模式與控制結構，不論是企業內部還是企業外部，皆已改變。在企業流程內的資訊系統也開始重新規劃，企業對企業 (B2B) 電子商務，或是稱為電子化企業，也已經變成企業生存最主要的要素。這門課將會教導上述內容，並把焦點放在所有這些相關議題，從策略規劃到現代化科技應用整合 (EAI) 等複雜的電子商務流程管理。這門課著重在報告以及創造力的訓練。在課程中，學生將會被分成若干專案小組以完成一個專案或是一份與電子化企業整合技術或工具相關的報告或應用，還有一些個案研讀。
description.en: This course introduces the modern integrated enterprises and organization. The focus is on the managerial and technical aspects of creating and managing modern IT enabled and integrated enterprises. It is clear that enterprises have been in rapid transition toward virtual enterprises with value chain integration for high efficiency and efficacy. Management styles based on hierarchical command and control structures have been challenged both within an enterprise and among enterprises.  Information systems are being realigned around business processes, and business-to-business (B2B) electronic commerce (or some call it "e-business") has become a key competence that business cannot survive without. This course provides such understanding by focusing on all aspects of managing this complex e-business oprocesses, from strategic planning to the technologies of modern enterprise application integration (EAI). The course stresses the importance of hands-on and creative training. Students will

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，其中包括：一因子實驗 ‧區集和拉丁方格 ‧不完全區集設計 ‧多因子實驗 ‧部份因子實驗 ‧巢狀或階層實驗 ‧變異數分析 ‧迴歸分析 ‧交互變異分析
description.en: Introduce the experiment design methods and conclusion. Such as: one factor experiment, Latin square, Multi factors experiment, ANOVA, regression.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control. In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided. This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程結合財務、資訊科學與數學方法，啟發學生使用電腦以數學方法求解財務決策問題。本課程內容包括，數值分析方法、電腦套裝軟體與資料結構、貨幣時間價值、證券評價理論、選擇權評價理論等財務決策。
description.en: The course is based on three major domains: finance, computer science, and mathematics. The goal of this course is to initiate students to use computers to develop mathematical methods to solve financial decision problems. The contents of this course include numerical analysis, computer software and data structure, time value of money, security evaluation, option pricing theory.

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程除了介紹排程的基本理論外，對排程於各種問題的應用亦有闡述。課程的主要目的在使學生學習排程的基本概念與法則，並瞭解排程於各種生產型態的應用。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on theoretical as well as applied aspects of scheduling of resources. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the basic concept and rules of sequencing and scheduling, and to understand the different scheduling application aspects for various shop floors.

name.zh: 人類資訊處理理論與應用
name.en: Human Information Processing Theories and Applications

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解人類認知過程之資訊處理理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用這些理論與模式來探討與提升整體系統之績效。
description.en: The purpose of the course is for students to learn about theories and models of human information processing with the consideration of task and environment characteristics, and to learn how to apply these theories and models for investigating and improving overall system performance.

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新"以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，管理思維更要突破創新，以有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。本課程以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，搭配四階品質機能展開，詳細介紹工程技術如何落實創新與管理實務創新如何執行。本課程適用於自有品牌業者、ODM或OEM製造業者、服務業者與學術單位教學研究，特點如下:完整詳實闡述TRIZ理論並輔以大量簡單案例說明TRIZ概念、工程TRIZ實務案例10餘個與TRIZ工程與管理之參數與創新原則說明簡例約800餘個，管理實務案例20餘個，包含研發管理、服務業管理、專案管理與生產管理等。案例與簡例最多，創新執行力可快速上手與實施應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in Product R&D, engineering, and management tactic in a innovative thinking manner. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 30 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, Project management, Service industry management, and Production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

description.zh: 針對存貨理論之簡單介紹，課程內容為確定性模式之經濟批量，連續性與週期性盤點策略，動態性模型與多階段系統。
description.en: Introduced simply in view of the goods in stock theory, curriculum content economy of batch for definite pattern, continuous and periodic inventory strategy, dynamic model and multi-stage system.

description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

Practical application examples will be demonstrated as well. The course syllabus include: 1. Introduction to online process monitoring, 2. monitoring system, 3. optics, 4. acoustics, 5. plasma, 6. optics applied in online process monitoring, 7. acoustics applied in online process monitoring, 8. system integration for online process monitoring, 9. network applications in process monitoring.

Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

The contents of this courseare shown as follows :1.Introduction to Hardware-Software Co-design2.Ststem Level Design of Embedded Systems3.Design Representation4.Function Optimizations5.Function/ Architecture Optimizations6.Architectural Optimizations7.Hardware/software Co-synthesis and Estimation8.Function/Architecture Optimization and Co-design Flow9.Synthesis Results

Mixed-mode Design 8. SOC Testing & Verification 9. Case Study

It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.en: This course will teach how to evaluate the soil's dynamic material properties by means of dynamic laboratory testing.Based on the analytical and numerical solution,the behaviour of soil-structure dynamic interaction can be predicted.

description.zh: 本課程為大學部地盤改良之一後續課程,進一步介紹比較重要和特殊的地盤改良工法之原理及其在土工和基礎施工方面之實際應用.此外,亦介紹與大地工程施工之安全與穩定具有密切關係的地錨工法和加勁土(補強土)工法.因此本課程包括下列各種工法之原理,設計及施工: 1.石灰穩定工法  2.水泥穩定工法  3.化學灌漿處理工法  4.凍結穩定工法  5.粉體噴射攪拌工法  6.碎石排水工法  7.地錨工法  8.加勁土(補強土)工法  9.地盤改良(穩定)工法之選擇.
description.en: This course introduces the principles and practical applications of the current and special method of soil Improvement in geotechnical engineering.In addition,as an important stability technique of soil slopes and soil grounds,reinforced earth method and ground anchor method are also introduced.Therefore,this course deals with the principle and practical application of following subjects;1.lime stabilization2.cement stabilization3.stabilization by grouting4.stabilization by freezing5.Dry Jet Mixing method 6.reinforced earth method 7.ground anchor method.

name.zh: 有限元素法在大地工程之應用

description.zh: 有限元素法常被用來模擬基礎施工、開控支撐及山坡地開控的過程，預估土壤或岩盤的變形行為，研判或分析施工的安全性。本課程的內容除了講授有限元素法的基本理論，尚須以大地工程的案例作為實際推導公式理論之演練。其案例包括滲流問題、壓密沉陷問題及土石結構穩定分析等等。
description.en: Finite element method ha been widely used to simulae the process of foundation construction, cut and bracing and excavation etc, and to predict and analyze the construction safety. This course should include the basic theory and sfiffues matrix formulation, in addition, geotechnical engineering problem are in addition, geotechical engineering problems are used to help students to understand the basic theory and code formulation. These examle problems includes seepage, consolidation and earth structure stability analyses.

description.zh: 資料研析方法,水文統計與迴歸分析,小流域洪水推估(含基本水文系統實驗),基本水文系統實驗,頻率分析(2),水文演算,水力演算,降雨逕流模擬,地理資訊系統(GIS)結合地文單位歷線,序率水文模式,HEC-2,6講解與實習,專題討論.
description.en: Introduction,Data error analysis,Hydrological statistics,Frequency analysis,Stochastic analysis,Hydrological routing,Hydraulic routing,GIUH plus GIS,Small watershed flood prediction(including Lab.experiment),Seminar.

description.zh: 本課程是較大學部的「岩石力學」課程為之深入探討岩石行為的課程，將針對岩石的指數性質、透水性、強度及變形性做更詳細的研究，並將比較岩石和土壤的不同，以及介紹機率概念在岩石力學上的應用。上課時將以研究論文為主，，書籍、報告為輔，其涵蓋的課程內容大致如下：1、岩石的指數性質2、岩石和土壤的不同3、岩體分類法4、岩石的透水性5、立體投影圖6、岩石的強度7、岩石的破壤準則8、岩石的變形性9、弱面的分析10、機率在岩石力學上的應用
description.en: Compared to the undergraduate Rock Mechanics course, this is a more advanced course to examine the behaviors of rocks under different stress conditions。 It will focus on the index properties, the permeability properties, the strength properties, and the deformation properties of rocks。 In addition, it will address the difference between rocks and soils by contrast。 Finally, this course will introduce students to the concept of probability, and how it can be applied to the Rock Mechanics。 The students taking this course will have plenty of reading assignments, and are required to participate in the classroom discussions。

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統(Geographical Information System，簡稱GIs)之開發與應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案；配合完整中文介面與印表技術，更可提高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資訊處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification.  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to GIS for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, and display capability along with GIS.

description.zh: 本課程著重於中英文口頭報告能力之培養，在模擬發表過程中，培養學生使用正確的表達用法，並建立適當之應對方式。
description.en: This course offers opportunities for students to develop their oral presentation skills in both Chinese and English languages via simulated presentations in class.  Students will learn how to present their papers precisely and how to engage a conversation properly.

description.zh: 流體動力與化學動力學，Rankine-Hugoniot 關係，擴散火燄與液滴燃燒，層流火燄，紊流火燄，引燃、焠熄、可燃極限，噴霧燃燒
description.en: Fluid Dynamics and Chemical Kinetics, Rankine-Hugoniot relations, Diffusion flames and Droplet Burning, Laminar Flames, Turbulent Flames, Ignition, Quenching and Flammability Limits, Spray Combustion.

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 以傳統與革新的觀點探究技職教育方案評鑑的理論與實務，包括專有名詞、評鑑的規劃、評鑑取向、評鑑標準、評鑑倫理、評鑑人員、資料蒐集分析與解釋的方法、評鑑結果的報告及後設評鑑等相關議題。
description.en: Exploring the program evaluation theory and practice from both traditional and innovative point of view on Technical-Vocational Education, including: design evaluation plans, evaluation ethics, evaluation standard, evaluator, design tools for collecting data, conduct observations and interviews, interpret data, write reports, provide assistance in communicating findings to various stakeholder groups, and metaevaluation.

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探討、生涯決定因素、生涯技巧、生涯角色調適、生涯選擇與規劃技巧、生涯訪談、生涯高原調適、性別和職業歧視、雙生涯家庭、就業準備等主要生涯的研究與實作。
description.en: In-depth study of research in career development and guidance. Topics include an introduction to career idea, the exploration of interest, personality, and view of value, decision making of career, techniques of career development, adjustment of career role, choice and planning of career, interview, adjustment of career highness, adjustment of changing role, discrimination of gender and job, a family of two career parents, job preparation.

name.zh: 學校人力資源發展與管理
name.en: Human Resource Development and Management in Schools

description.zh: （一）瞭解學校人力資源發展與管理之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行學校人力資源發展與管理之基本能力。課程內容包括：學校人力資源發展與管理之定義與內涵、人力資源管理與學校效能、學校人力資源發展之需求評估與規劃、教職員工甄選、教職員工的工作動機、教職員工專業發展、教職員工的績效評量、薪資與獎勵及創造高生產力的工作環境等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development and management in schools, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of developing human resource development and management in schools. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development and management in schools, human resource management and effective schools, assessing and planning of human resource development in schools, selecting staffs, motivation of personnel, professional development for educational personnel, evaluating employee performance, compensation and rewards, and creating productive work environments.

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

description.zh: 本課程檢視受到廣泛使用的主要教育評鑑模式，並熟悉教育評鑑模式的取向與實用技術。
description.en: This course is designed to review the most widely used model for educational evaluation, to conversant with approach and utility technique of evaluation models.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

description.zh: 本課程之開課，在探索技職教育課程發展的學理，包括技職教育課程的意義﹑課程發展的基本原理及理論基礎，進而瞭解技職教育的類型及其發展模式，考量課程實施的各項條件，具備課程評鑑的觀念，最後能掌握技職教育課程的發展動向，同時對現行技職教育課程發展的實務問題，提出解決對策。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the rationale of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, including the concept of curriculum, theories of curriculum development, principles and models of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, and the problem of curriculum development in technical-vocational education in Taiwan.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: 本課程內容以個體、團體與組織三層次為經，以行為基礎、激勵理論、個體決策、團體行為、團體決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相關議題為緯，探討組織相關之理論及管理實務。
description.en: The curriculum discusses the theory and practice of organization management in terms of the horizontal development of the individual, group, and organization and the vertical development of the related issue on behavior foundation, encouragement theory, individual decision, group behavior, group decision, communication theory, leadership, power and politics, leadership, organization design, organization culture, organization change and development.

description.zh: 探討數位化課程網站的系統化設計方法與過程。內容包括課程網站的分析、規劃、設計、發展、測試、評估等，以及實際網站案例介紹等。
description.en: To explore systematic design methodologies and progress of figital course website analysis, planning, design, development, test, and evaluation, and practical cares of course website etc.

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

name.zh: 網路學習社群專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on Web-Based Learning Community

description.zh: 探討網路學習社群之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習社群之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、環境、形成要素、成員角色與任務、線上討論與知識分享、成功因素、經營管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore advnced issues on Web-based learning community (WBCL)including WBCL theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, environment, formed factors, member roles and tasks, online discussion, successful factors, operation and management, practical cases, and future trrnds etc..

description.zh: 縱覽教育經濟學理論基礎，研習教育經濟研究方法論，主題探討包含:台灣經濟成功的要件，經濟政策與發展軌跡及高科技的挑戰，重要論點在於如何結合技職教育融入台灣新興產業要求。
description.en: Overview of theories and research methodology in the economics of education. Topics include elements of success economic policies, economic policies, economic development, and challenges of hi-tech era in Taiwan, and discussion of issues on what elements impact Taiwan's economic development and how to combine the technical-vocational education with the development of Taiwan's new industry.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: The material in this course covers implantable, nonimplantable, and extracorporeal materials. Implantables include sutures, vascular grafts, artificial heart, artificial bones and ligaments, drug delivery device, artificial tissues, artificial liver,etc. Nonimplantable materials are : cloths in medical uses,  surgical dressings and gauze, injection device, diagonsis materials, etc. Extracorporeal materials are : dialysis fibers, artificial lung, catheters, etc.

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 介紹有機材料：如染料、界面活性劑、添加劑、單體、生物活性物質等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用等。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of organic materials. The various types of organic materials such as dyestuffs, surfactants, additives, monomers and bioactive agents will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

description.zh: 課程內容主要介紹無機化學研究過程中﹐所使用的各種物理方法。首先介紹光譜學之基本原理。隨後將較深入的探討應用在無機化學與固體材料上的各種光譜技術。包括：各種吸收光譜、核磁共振光譜、電子順磁共振光譜、Ｘ光吸收光譜及Ｘ光繞射等應用於化學之常用分析技術﹐也都包括在課程討論範圍之內。
description.en: I.                  General Introduction to SpectroscopyII.                 Group Theory III.               Absorption Spectroscopies --- UV-Vis, IR, Raman IV.               X-ray crystallography V.                 Bonding models in inorganic chemistryVI.               The structure and reactivity of moleculesVII.                    solid state

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

name.en: A Briefing on Architecture Design Course (I)

description.zh: 總課程目標：     在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非      實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研一課程目標：          了解理論與實踐之理性關係，其對象應包含自實質至非實質環      境。 課程概要：     利用不同設計課題就學員原有專長實際操作其自理論至實踐之      因果關係。此階段較偏向對目標之了解，就各學員所選定課題      完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程書面資料，以接受目      標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course :   Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn   to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and   practice in both substantial and non-substantial   environments. 1st GradeThrough manipulation of different design topics,   the disciples learn to understand the relational   relationship between theory and practice in both   substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete   presentation which includes design result and a report of   the process of the ascertainment will be required for   evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一)大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二)都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三)都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四)新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken  depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1)	Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2)	Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3)	Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design	(4)	Exercise on urban design for new development area

description.zh: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。
description.en: This is a design studio class, focused on the technical side for topics as Green Building, Building Systems, Digital Design Media, Building Production, Building Reuse, Environment Control, and others were be included. There will have only two or three topics in each semester, depends on the teacher's specialty, and each student needs take two topics in one year.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉研究方法設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、個案研究法、人種誌研究法，行動研究法，觀察研究法和內容分析研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with the procedures of research in education and applied linguistics.  Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; case study; grounded theory research; ethnographic research; narrative research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies.  Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

name.zh: 研究方法--文化研究應用
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 「研究成果具有足以影響意見和行動的力量，因此有責任感的作者會以謹慎細心的態度撰寫之」。(MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv).本課程以人文學科領域通用的MLA系統為基礎，加強學生對論文撰寫規範的認識，並經由研究過程的實踐和論文的撰寫體認學術研究的目的及價值。課程開始時學生須選擇一較為廣泛的主題，學習如何抽絲剝繭，找出核心的問題，進一步釐清研究的重點所在，然後經過仔細研究搜尋，最後以論文報告呈現成果。透過此一過程，學生將體認到學術研究有嚴謹明確的規範，需經過一步一步的印證，方能寫出合乎專業水準的研究論文或報告。
description.en: "Because research has the power to affect opinions and actions, responsible writers compose their work with great care." (MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv).This course will define for students the rules, practices, purposes, and value of scrupulous scholarship and careful documentation in accordance with the MLA system shared by a wide community of researchers world-wide.  Beginning with the selection of a general topic, moving toward a specific research question and then researching and documenting the answer to that question will be a step-by-step process with clear guidelines resulting in the student's knowledge of how to produce a paper acceptable to scholars world-wide.

description.zh: 本科目以跨學科多媒體的方式來探討不同媒介(與文類)的作品之間如何存在著啟發創意的連鎖反應，與創意激盪的引力關係，並探索何以同一時代不同的藝術形式之間展現出類似的創意主題與手法，進而形成時代的文化特色。以荷蘭畫家維米爾(Vermeer)的名畫「戴珍珠耳環的少女」為例，此畫作激發了作家歇維理(Chevalier)無限的想像空間而寫了一部同名小說，試圖去解釋畫作背後之奧秘。接著，受小說的激發，一部同名電影應運而生，把小說情節加以改編，並參考維米爾其它畫作, 試圖重現原畫創作時畫家個人、家庭與時代風采。這一連串連鎖激盪之下，不同媒介與文類的新作品出爐了，各有特色，而且彼此間還有相互連結和彼此評論的關係。有時候，類似的連結(可能在主題或手法上)普遍地出現在同一時代不同的藝術形式之間，這說明了此一連鎖與創意激盪的關係如何大規模地造成文化思想潮流與大眾流行文化。以「解構(後結構)思潮」為例，原本在哲學領域獨樹一格，進入文學批評理論領域後成為顯學，進而影響藝術評論與創作理念。後來更傳播至建築理論與設計，造成「解構建築」之流行與歪斜屋宇之誕生。儼然成為「後現代文化」的註冊商標。這一文化傳播的現象乃依賴前述之(1)啟發創意的連鎖反應，
description.en: This course adopts an interdisciplinary and inter-medium approach to understanding the cultural creation of a text.  The target is to investigate how a cultural/literary text is created in relation to, and in response to, another text in different media/genres, and how this "chain reaction" or "web of influences" displays a rippling effect that travels across the boundaries among painting, music, architecture, literature, and film.  For example, Vermeer's painting entitled "The Girl with a Pearl Earring" inspires the creation of a novel by Tracy Chevalier, which in turn facilitates the creation of a movie also with the same title. The case is the same with the musical piece of "Gloomy Sunday" which inspires the creation of many verbal/visual/audio art forms under the same title and even makes a social impact on increasing suicide cases.  These related texts form a "constellation" of "cycle," and certain ideas are so powerful that they permeate many genres/media at the same period of ti

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創作能力，寫作文類包括詩、小說和戲劇，乃至任何別出心裁的新類型，如以非小說類型呈現的多媒體創作。學生經由本課程所學的教巧訓練和寫作策略的運用，不但將具備寫作的能力和深度，更可直接將此能力學以致用，發揮在專業寫作上，包括新聞、設計、廣告以及藝術管理行政。
description.en: Students in this course obtain practical experience writing poetry, fiction and drama, as well as in working with the newly emergent creative writing genres of creative non-fiction and multi-media performance.  The skills, techniques and strategies learned in this class will not only help students realize their own abilities and insights as writers, but are directly applicable to wide range of professions, including journalism, design, advertising and arts organization administration.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.超音波技術簡介2.基礎彈性力學3.彈性動力學4.平面波5.平面波的反射6.平面波的折射7.表面波8.藍姆波(平板波)9.超音波於非破壞檢測之應用10.超音波於材料性質量測之應用11.超音波於醫學診斷與治療之應用12.超音波於感測器及通訊應用之應用13.超音波於加工應用之應用
description.en: 1.Introduction to ultrasonics 2.Basic elasticity for ultrasonics 3.Elastodynamics 4.Plane waves 5.Reflection of plane waves 6.Refraction of plane waves 7.Surface waves 8.Lamb waves 9.Ultrasonics in nondestructive testing  10.Application of ultrasonics to material characterizations 11.Application of ultrasonics in medical diagnostics and treatments 12.Application of ultrasonics to sensors and telecommunications 13.Application of ultrasonics to machining

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意一維系統的自由及強制振動多維系統的自由及強制振動自然頻率的計算與模態分析振動的控制振動量測與應用振動系統之數值分析方法非線性振動機構與動力傳動元件的振動分析
description.en: Free and Forced vibrations of Single Degree of Freedom Systems, Free and Forced vibrations of Multi-degree of Freedom Systems,  Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes, Vibration Control, Vibration Measurement and Applications, Numerical Methods in Vibration Analysis, Non-liner Vibration, Vibration Analysis of Mechanisms and Power Transmission Elements.

description.zh: 簡介﹙廣義的逆向工程系統、狹義的逆向工程系統﹚，數位擷取設備﹙接觸式探頭、非接觸式探頭﹚，曲面模型﹙電腦圖學簡史、3D電腦繪圖、Bezier曲線、NURBS曲線曲面﹚，逆向工程軟體之功能，電腦輔助檢驗，軟硬體整合與實作。
description.en: Introduction, Digitizing Devices (Tactile Probes, Non-contact Probes), Surface Modeling (Computer Graphics, 3D Rendering, Bezier Curve, NURBS Surface),Curve and Surface Editing, Computer Aided Verification.

notes: 限12人(另保留人數給今年沒選到的)

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行設計發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further design presentation. Efficient experience exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 跨文化溝通, 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved intercultural communication and design project with research and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive research. The study of related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 物件導向程式語言已成為當前軟體發展主流語言，利用抽象、封裝、委任、繼承、多形等特性達成軟體設計的彈性、重複使用性等。隨著軟體規模日漸龐大，軟體工程師需更進一步具備更有效的抽象化與重覆使用設計技術，而設計樣式為當前滿足此目標主要的設計方法。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個樣式導向軟體設計專題。    本課程涵蓋下列主題：1	物件導向式程式設計原理2	單元測試3	設計樣式4	樣式導向設計原理5	樣式導向設計個案研究6	樣式語言7	樣式語言個案研究8	樣式導向軟體設計專題
description.en: Object-oriented programming languages such as C++ and Java have become the main stream in modern software development. Object-orientation makes flexibility and reuse possible through its characteristics of abstraction, encapsulation, delegation, inheritance, and polymorphism. However, as the scale of software increases, software engineers need an even more powerful tool of abstraction and reuse. Design patterns have been established as the main design techniques to achieve reusable object-oriented design. This course aims to establish this core capability. The student is expected to complete a term project that involves 150 to 200 hours of work off class.     The following topics are covered: 1	Principles of object-oriented programming 2	Unit testing3	Design patterns4	Principles of pattern-oriented design5	Case studies in pattern-oriented design6	Pattern languages7	Case studies in Pattern languages8	Term project in pattern-oriented design

description.zh: 現代通訊與訊號處理系統仰賴電路、硬體與軟體之間的協同運作，因此通訊工程師應具備必要的軟體設計的能力。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標，並以C++為語言主要教學語言。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個通訊軟體設計專題。    本課程涵蓋下列主題：1	通訊軟體特性2	程序式程式設計3	物件式程式設計4	物件導向式程式設計5	泛型式程式設計：使用C++ 標準模板函式庫(STL)6	單元測試7	通訊軟體函式庫8	通訊軟體設計個案研9	通訊軟體設計專題
description.en: Modern communication and signal processing systems rely on the close collaboration of circuits, hardware, and software. Therefore, software design is one of the core capabilities that communication system engineers should possess. This course aims to establish this core capability using C/C++ as the working language. The student is expected to complete a term project that involves 150 to 200 hours of work off class.     The following topics are covered: 1	Characteristics of Communication Software2	Procedure-oriented programming3	Object-based programming4	Object-oriented programming5	Generic programming using C++ Standard Template Library (STL)6	Unit testing7	Communication libraries8	Case studies in communication software design9	Term project in communication software design

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質 1.2 遞迴關係之解        1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧 2.1 計算複雜度之上下限2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析 2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧 3.1 分擊法 3.2 貪婪法 3.3 動態規劃 3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度 4.1 資訊理論證明法 4.2 對抗式證明法 4.3 問題之線性轉換 4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background 1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions 1.2 Solving recurrence relations 1.3 Mathematical induction 2. Basic analysis techniques 2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds 2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis 2.3 Amortized analysis 3. Basic Design Paradigms 3.1 Divide and conquer 3.2 Greedy methods 3.3 Dynamic programming 3.4 Probabilistic algorithms 4. Computational Complexity 4.1 Information-theoretic arguments 4.2 Adversary arguments 4.3 Linear reduction of problems 4.4 NP-completeness

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5.分散式同作控制   6.電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1. Process synchronization 2. Concurrency Mechanisms 3. Virtual memory 4. Distributed Systems 5. Distributed Concurrency Control 6. Queuing Models

description.zh: 1.數位視訊的表示法 2.畫面內編碼 3.JPEC與JPEG2000 4.動作補償與畫面間編碼 5.視訊傳輸之漸進式編碼與強健性 6.合成影像之編碼7.多媒體資料索引與檢索8.智慧財產權的保護：浮水印與其他９.MPEG標準
description.en: 1.Representations of Digital Video2.Intraframe Coding3.JPEG and JPEG 2000Standards4.Motion Compensation and Interframe Coding5.Content-BasedScalability and Robustness of Video   Transmission6.Coding of Synthetic Video7.Multimedia Indexing and Retrieval8.IP Protection Techniques:watermarking and others9.MPEG Standards

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probability and random processes. It includes probability measures, random variables, the law of large numberrandom processes and stationary processes. The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念與技術。學生將學習開發高品質軟體相關的原理、觀念、方法、與技術。本課程將介紹下列主題：一、軟體工程簡介二、軟體流程模型三、需求工程四、軟體設計方法五、物件導向軟體開發六、軟體測試與驗證七、軟體品質確保八、軟體維護九、軟體專案管理與規劃十、軟體工程進階主題
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students with a full awareness of the knowledge and technologies of software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the practices, concepts, methods, and techniques for producing high quality software. The course will cover the following topics: 1.An Overview of Software Engineering2.Software Process Models3.Requirements Engineering4.Software Design Methods5.Object-Oriented Software Development6.Software Testing Strategy and Tactics7.Software Quality Assurance8.Software Maintenance9.Software Project Management and Planning10.Advanced Topics in Software Engineering

description.zh: 嵌入式系統目前愈來愈普遍。它將會大大地影響我們的生活方式。可攜式裝置如智慧型手機、掌上型電腦、以及所謂的IA裝置如家用網路閘道器、數位視訊錄影機、和常見的遊戲機都是屬於嵌入式系統的範疇。	在本課程中,我們將會討論何謂嵌入式系統、嵌入式系統的形式、以及如何建構一個嵌入式系統。由於嵌入式系統包含硬體及軟體的議題，我們也會探討相關的主題。	本課程的先修課程包含計算機組織與結構、C程式語言、資料結構、系統程式、以及作業系統。課程主要內容如下： 	嵌入式系統簡介與概論 	嵌入式精簡指令集結構 	ARM指令集 	嵌入式計算平台 	嵌入式程式設計與分析 	嵌入式作業系統 	系統設計技術 	裝置操作 	網路本課程亦包含實習與學期專題作業。
description.en: Embedded systems are more and more popular today. It will affect the human life greatly. Portable devices like smart phone, PDA, and MP3 player, and so-called IA devices such as home gateway, DVR, and game machine are all categorized as embedded systems.	In this course, we will discuss what an embedded system is, what it looks like, and how to build an embedded device. Since an embedded system involves hardware and software issues, we will discuss the related subjects. 	The prerequisite courses for this class include computer organization and architecture, the C programming language, data structure, system programming, and operating system. The major topics of this course are listed as follows: 	Introduction and Basic Concepts 	The RISC Embedded Architectures 	The ARM instruction Set 	The Embedded Computing Platforms 	Program Design and Analysis 	The Embedded Operating Systems 	System Design Techniques 	Device Manipulation 	NetworksExperimental laboratories and

description.zh: 1.電腦通訊網路簡介 2. 階層結構 3. 路由與交換技術 4.流量與壅塞控制 5.介質存取控制機制 6.區域網路 7.網路互連技術 8.無線網路 9.高速網路
description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Communication Networks 2.Layered Structure 3.Routing and Switching Techniques 4.Flow and Congestion Control 5.Medium Access Control Mechanism  6. Local Area Networks 7. Network Interconnection 8. Wireless Networks 9. High Speed Networks

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。

Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

description.zh: 由於台灣地小人稠,為了更有效利用土地,達到更高之生產量,使得土壤污染問題特別顯得重要,因此整治土壤污染是刻不容緩.本課程對於土壤污染之整治由萃取,氣提,固定安定化,淋洗,電熔等物化方法傳授之,其次講授生物復育技術,最後以工程經濟角度,進行本益比分析。.
description.en: There are many remediate methods in this class.The methods include solvent extraction,air stripping,solidification/stabilization,solid flushing,and thermel treatment.This f topicalso includes bioremediation and cost effective analysis.

description.zh: 選習本課程應具有普化及一般有機化學知識，此課程主要講授環境上（尤其是應用在工程上）有關的有機化學專業知識，其主要內容包括：１.有機物種與特性２.有機物之基本化學反應３.有毒（害）有機物之處理原理４.環境有機物之代謝與循環機制５.環境荷爾蒙之化性６.微量有機物之採樣分析原理
description.en: Based on general chemistry, the course provides professional knowledge on the organic chemistry in the environment. It includes the following major items：1.Characteristics and classification of organics.2.Fundamentals of chemical reaction for organics.3.Mechanics of cycling and metabolism of organics in the environment.4.Chemical properties of environmental Hollomans5.Theory of treatment for hazardous organics.6.Principle of sampling and analysis for micro-organics in the environment.

description.zh: 氣膠為懸浮在空氣中的微小固體或液體粒子。本課程深入探討氣膠科學（微塵學）及其工程上之應用。．氣膠理化特性，粒徑分布．氣膠運動學：擴散和布朗運動，過濾機制，荷電性質，熱泳等．光學特性及其應用．氣膠的測量原理與方法．大氣氣膠及生物氣膠
description.en: ．Indroduction:characterization of aerosols,shape and size distributions．Particle transport:Brownian motion and diffusion, centrifugation, intertia and filtration, convective diffusion,extermal forcr fields, thermal force．Optical properties:visibility, light scattering．Aerosol dynamics:coagulation, formation and growth．Atmospheric Aerosois and Bioaerosols．Measurement of aerosol

name.zh: 室內空氣品質控制與管理
name.en: Indoor Air Quality Control and management

description.zh: 室內空氣品質及室內空氣污染對人體之危害、空氣環境汙染物、換氣與通風、檢測方法、污染源診斷、空氣品質控制及改善、國內外法規、管理計劃規劃。含室內空氣污染物之移除技術、室內空氣清淨機原理應用於室內空氣品質之控制。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, air pollutants, fresh air and air conditioning & ventilation, indoor air quality control, management and regulation, indoor air cleaners.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 自動化機械簡介，規劃及設計，驅動器，感測器可程式控制，氣液壓迴路控制，電腦介面控制，自動化系統實例介紹及應用。
description.en: Introduction ， design  and  planning  for  Automatic  machine ， Actuators  sensors ， PLC ， pneumatic  control ， PC - based  control ， Examples  for  Automatic  system  and  its  application .

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1)介紹，(2)數位影像基礎，(3)空間域影像強化，(4)頻域影像強化，(5)影像還原，(6)彩色影像處理，(7)形態學影像處理，(8)影像分割，(9)小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

description.zh: 本課程旨於深入探討如何利用數學方法來分析並了解工程上之問題之數學模式，藉以「線性轉換」、「向量分析」、「微分算子」與「複變分析」等四大內容，以及其應用方法。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on "linear transformation", "vector analysis", "differential operator" and "complexanalysis" to analysis and modeling the engineering problems.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

description.zh: 1.幾何光學2.波動光學3.光束光學4.傅氏光學5.光電磁學6.偏極光學與晶體光學

description.zh: 本課程包括：光的傳播、光的向量特性、光的同調性與干涉、多光束的干涉、光的繞射、晶體光學、熱輻射與光子、光譜、光跡光學。
description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   真空工程, 直流電源, 射頻電源, 微波, 熱燈絲等各種能量方式之CVD化學氣相沉積法, PVD物理氣相沉積法, 電鍍技術,以及膜的特性觀察與實驗，包括SEM，EDX，XRD與金相顯微觀察，附著力測試等。1.光電半導體V-I特性分析試驗 2.接面型光電元件C-V量測實驗 3.光導電及少數載體存活時間量測實驗 4.邁克蓀干涉儀實驗(3)5.雷射繞射實驗(3) 6.偏振實驗(3)7.分光儀實驗(3)
description.en: The practices in vacuum engineering, variety deposition methods such as CVD, PVD and electroplating, that include DC, RF, microwave hot filament etc are be performed. Tests of film properties and its characterizations such as SEM, EDX, XRD, and metallurgical microscope are also be examined.1.Experiment on V-I characteristics of photonic devices.2.C-V measurements of optoelectronic devices.3.Measurements of photoconductivity and minority-carrier lifetime of photonic materials.4.Lab on Michelson interferometer5.Lab Experiment on diffraction 6.Lab on polarization7.Lab on spectrometer

notes: 專業必選課程，如大學已修過光電實驗則不必再修習此課

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。 本課程介紹各種光學方法用以量測位移及角度之變化量，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號以便進行分析，其內容含：1.簡介 2.光學尺 3.干涉儀 4.幾何誤差 5.幾何光學尺 6.雷射光學尺 7.雙頻干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target. Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves：1.Introduction 2.Geometrical error 3.Laser encoder 4.Interferometers 5.Optical encoder 6.Optical

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。  由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: 1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖種類及特性 3.訊號的退化 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.數位傳輸系統 8.光固子及DWDM系統

Layouts of pixels with TFT switches  7. Circuit model of LCDs  8. Addressing of LCDs  9. Driving compensation for response time

Conversion Efficiency Limits, Losses, and Measurement, 5. Silicon Solar Cell Technology, 6. Compound Material and Multi-Junction Solar Cell Technology, 7. Advance Solar Cells, 8. Solar Cell Systems and Applications.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

name.zh: 生物科技產品品質安全與管理法規
name.en: The Introduction to Quality,Safety and Regulation of Biology

description.zh: 生物科技產業已是二十一世紀世界各國的重要產業，我國亦視生技產業為繼電子產業後的新興產業，然而生物科技產業與其他科技產業的差異，在於用於人體或具醫療用途的生技產品，除了品質管理外，更須考慮安全與效能，我國與世界各國對於生技產品大都以建置相當程度的法規環境，以有效的管理生技產品並確保人之安全。因此，對於生技產品特有的管理制度以及安全與效能等特殊需求若無正確的認識，將非常不利產業發展。本課程將以疫苗、血液製劑、基因工程製劑、診斷試劑、人體細胞組織產品等目前已研發成熟與正發展中的生技產品為例，從產品設計、品質與製程管制、效能與安全評估、法規環境與管理制度到我國管理方式，以深入淺出的方式做完整的介紹，此外，課程中也將針對生技產業面臨的生物安全問題及其需要的設施、生技產業的挑戰與機會等議題，進行充分的講述與討論。透過此課程，期望學生建立在生技產品品質管理、製程管制、安全評估及產品登記等方面的基本概念，以培養生技產業目前極度缺乏的製程規劃人材。
description.en: In the 21th century, the bio-technological industry has been the important industry in the world.  It is also the most emergent sunrise industry following the electronics industry in Taiwan.  The bio-technological industry is very different from the other technological industries.  The biological products intended for human therapeutic use have to face the needs of safety and efficacy except product quality.  Taiwan government and other countries have established the regulatory framework for biological products to ensure their safety and efficacy.  Therefore, the realization of the management system for biological products is very useful to industry development.This course uses the examples of vaccines, blood products,  recombinant DNA products, diagnostic devices and human cell and tissue-based products to introduce the design control, quality control, process control, evaluation for safety and efficacy and regulatory framework in Taiwan.  The course also discusses the issues of fac

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋以下範圍：人類基因之組成、基因表達與疾病之關係、基因不穩定性與疾病之相關、家譜基因、遺傳基因特色、 癌症基因、與致病基因尋求方法介紹: 核酸雜交法、定序分析、聚合?鏈反應、體外基因誘變等.
description.en: Lectures are concerned with the following topics: Organization of the human genome, human gene expression, instability of the human genome, genes in pedigrees, genetic mapping of mendelian characters, molecular pathology, cancer genetics. The methods are used to search the possible disease-cause gene, will be introduced as following: physical and transcript mapping, nucleic acid hybridization assays, PCR, DNA sequencing and in vitro mutagenesis etc.

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋以下幾項範圍：染色体結構,DNA複製與轉錄,蛋白質結構、功能、輸送、合成與分解、真核與原核細胞基因調控、分子發育學、跳躍基因、癌症與免疫生物學等。並引導學生探討幾個相關分子生物化學較深入的知識。包括:蛋白質接受器、生物膜、生物代謝和基因調控、人類疾病的生物化學及分子生物和生物技術。
description.en: Lectures are concerned with number of selected topics in molecular biochemistry.: structure and coding capacity of DNA chromosomes; DNA replication; transcription, protein synthesis; protein structure and function; protein transport; protein degradation; receptors; biological membranes; prokaryotic and eukaryotic regulation; metabolic and genetic regulation; transposable elements and genetic engineering; cancer and immunobiology, biochemistry of human diseases and the techniques that underpin the developments of molecular biology and biotechnology.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

name.en: Special Topics on Characteristics of Polymers

description.zh: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹薄膜製作有關的基礎理論與技術。講述內容包括真空技術，薄膜基礎，薄膜製作技術，蝕刻技術，薄膜評估方法以及薄膜技術的應用等。讓學生認識薄膜在高科技產業上的應用與其重要性，製作薄膜的方法與技術以及其未來的發展。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Thin films technology and Thin film materials science. 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films.

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

description.zh: 包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中，可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容     複材之製造及應用，單向纖維強化複材之應力與應變關係，複材之等效模數，強度分析，濕熱效應，黏彈行為，破壞分析，試驗方法，不連續纖維強化複材。
description.en: This course is a Special topics of composite materials.

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
