description.zh: 1.合金製程簡介2.成份改變製程　a.合金熔煉-感應電爐、真空感應電爐  b.合金精煉-電弧爐、  c.電渣重熔精煉、真空電弧精煉、電子束精煉、電漿精煉3.合金結構改變製程　a.凝固控製與快速凝固　　b.方向性凝固　　　　　c.熱處理控制-均質化、強化處理　　d.鍛造、晶粒控制　　　　　　　4.合金形狀改重製程鍛造、軋壓、擠形、粉末冶金5.未來合金製程之發展及電腦之應用
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Processes of Structural Alloys.

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 本課程在討論生醫工程之性質與應用在整形外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫工程之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the engineering of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程主 要是對生醫玻璃處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括生醫玻璃技術的基本理論，處理技術，各種生醫玻璃的製造方法與相關知識，以及各種生醫玻璃技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Bio-glass in the system of Na2O- CaO-Sio2-P2O5 and related glasses are introduces initially in this course. The Bioactive glasses and Glass-ceramic in clinical uses are taught next. The following chapter is covered from bio-glasses and glass-ceramics bond to living bone through layer which is formed on their surfaces in the living body. Blass-ceramics for hyperthermia treatment of cancer and Glasses for radiotherapy of cancer is brief introduced in this course finally.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

name.zh: 平面顯示器原理與技術
name.en: Principle of Flat Panel Display Technology

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: Introduction of the theories and technologies of flat panel display and the future development of flat display technology.  1.Introduction 2.Sight and color 3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT) 4.Plasma panel display(PDP) 5.Liquid crystal display(LCD) 6.Electrolumisence display(ELP) 7.Field emission display(FED) 8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

description.zh: 本課程內容含有: (1)簡介。(2)貯氫合金種類(3)貯氫合金結構與性質(4)貯氫合金製程---機械冶金(5)貯氫合金製程---真空感應熔煉(6)貯氫材料之吸放氫測量方法(7)貯氫合金應用(8)鎳氫電池材料(9)奈米碳材之結構與性質(10)奈米碳材之製程(11)奈米碳材之應用(12)氫燃料電池---質子交換膜材料(13)氫燃料電池---膜電極組材料
description.en: The class includes :1.Course Introduction, 2.Classes of Hydrogen Storage Alloys (HSAs),3. Structure and Properties of HSAs,4. Production of HSAs ---Mechanical Alloying Process,5.,roduction of HSAs ---Vacuum Induction Melting (VIM) Process,6.. Method of Measuring Storage Capacity for Hydrogen Storage Materials,7. Application of HSAs,8. Materials of Nickel Hydride Battery Electrode,9. Structure and Properties of Carbon Nano Tubes (CNTs), 10. Production of CNTs, 11. Application of CNTs,12. Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Proton Exchange Membrane, 13 Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Membrane Electrode Assembly (MEA)

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理3.電子擾繞射理論4.電子繞射圖行及缺陷分析方法5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2.The electron Microscope3.Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM)　(1)Electron beam-specimen interaction　(2)Image formation in the SEM4.Transmission Electron Microscopy(TEM)　(1)Diffraction Theory  (2)Contrast Theory5.Specimen Preparation

description.zh: 介紹晶體的各種完美結構，缺陷結構的形成與各種物理特性的相互關係，電子的波動與粒子之性質，電子於自由電子能量井，固態中行為與能帶觀念之介紹，固態材料的鬆散行為，固態的介電性質。
description.en: An introduction to Solid-State Physics in materials science.

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 一、地質資料之收集分析與應用二、大地應力分析量測方法。三、地下坑室設計。四、地下坑室施工。五、監測與管理。
description.en: 一、Collection analysis and application of geological data二、Geotechnical stress analysis and measurement。三、Underground excavation design。四、Underground excavation operation。五、Monitoring and management。

description.zh: 一、系統、相、成份、自由度、Gibbs相律及其應用二、一成份系統相圖熱力學。三、二成份系統相圖熱力學。四、三成份系統相圖熱力學。五、相變化動力學簡介。六、相圖測定簡介。
description.en: 1.System、 phase 、component 、freedom 、Gibbs Law and its application2.One component system3.Two component system4.Three component system。5.The kinetics of phase equilibrium (transformation)6.Phase diagram determination

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。本課程偏重與大地工程相關之調查、規劃、設計、研究、分析、試驗等相關的案例討論。高等大地工程(一)主要課程單元包括:[1]基礎工程案例、[2]邊坡特性分類、[3]邊坡特性調查、[4]邊坡安定分析、[5]邊坡工程整治、[6]邊坡工程案例等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [I] consist of (1) Case studies of foundation problems, (2) Landslide Types, (3) Investigation of landslide features, (4) Stability analysis of slope, (5) Mitigation of unstable slope, (6) Engineering case studies.

description.zh: 資源工程的製程技術範圍包括了一些無機性及有機性物質的物理與化學變化。要有效的應用這些物質的製程技術，必須要對製程的化學反應動力學有基本的認識。本課程的主要目的在於教導學生如何設計一個程序以進行所要的化學反應。進行此類程序設計必須要將物理程序與化學程序的速率式相結合。而相關的基本原理包括：物理程序的能量傳送及質量傳送原理，及化學程序的反應動力學。為了達到這個目的，學生要對化學反應的本徵反應速率及程序的輸送現象有基本的認識。此外，本課程亦將介紹反應器設計的基本原理。據此，本課程的教學內容包括：1.	化學反應動力學2.	理想反應器的基本質量守恆3.	等溫與非等溫反應器原理4.	非均質反應程序、觸媒與吸附理論
description.en: Material and resources processing technologies focus on the physical and chemical process of inorganic and organic materials. For effective applications of these processing technologies, understanding the principles of chemical kinetics is essential. The major objective of this course is to learn how to design a process for carrying out desirable chemical reaction. To design this process requires rates of both physical and chemical processes. The principles governing such physical processes as energy transfer and mass transfer are often as important as those which govern chemical kinetics. To combine the rates of chemical and physical process, the essential feature is to understand the intrinsic rate of chemical reaction and the transport phenomena of the process. In addition, the basic principles of reactor design will also be introduced based on abovementioned fundamental principles. Therefore, the contents of this course include:1.	chemical kinetics2.	fundamentals of mass conser

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

description.zh: 地質學是自然科學的一門，是研究地球這個人類所居住的星球自生成以來，組成的物質成分與結構之變化的科學。由於地質學主要是由現在所觀察得到的自然現象去推論現在地球中岩石的組成與結構，並用逆推(Retrodiction)的推論來解釋過去發生在地球之中的各種變化。因此野外觀察為地質學研究的最基本工作。在野外觀察時所用的方法與所依據的原則與理論，即是野外地質學學習的重點。本課程之內容除複習野外地質學與地質調查的一般觀念及基本原理，包括野外地質學導論，火成岩、沉積岩與變質岩地區的地質現象與地質調查的方法外，還將進一步建立區域地質圖測製的能力，以便未來能將地質調查的能力應用於各個相關領域。
description.en: Geologic fieldwork is the basic ability for all geological studies, whether they are simply intended to describe the rocks by various field methods, or whether they form the basis of interpretive studies based upon laboratory analysis of rock samples and geochemical and geophysical data collected in the field. Such data cannot be interpreted without detailed observations of the field relationships between collected samples and of the geology of areas in which measurements were made.Professer Tucker had said that "The study of field geology is often an exciting and rewarding occupation. However, to get the most out of these rocks, it is necessary to undertake precise and accurate fieldwork. The secret of successful fieldwork is a keen eye for detail and an enquiring mind. Be observant, see everything in the outcrop, then think about the things seen and look again."This course is designed as advanced training to field observation, description and geologic mapping for graduate student

description.zh: 電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
description.en: The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

name.zh: 互動媒體設計專題講座

description.zh: 為掌握產業界的技術新知、學術界的專業研究、藝文界的脈動等，本課程講座將廣邀互動媒體設計的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術等面向，分別以宏觀的政治、社會、文化、科技、環境等角度剖析，另以微觀角度深入個案研究作探討，藉此議題討論互動媒體設計的現況與未來發展趨勢。教學評量將以各項的主題式討論報告為主。
description.en: To understand science and technological information from business, professional research from academic and issues from art and cultural fields, the seminars on interactive media design should be invited these fields of expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion. With the macro-perspective of politics, social, culture, technology and environment, the seminar focuses on the dimension of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art. Besides, the seminars explore case studies with micro-perspective to discuss interactive media design existing and future development. The assessment includes thematic discussion and final report.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人本設計 (User-Centered Design, UCD) 之理論與應用。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念-以使用者為中心之設計，課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過案例之研討了解其應用。課程內容包含使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用性設計與評估、以使用者為中心之創新產品設計與開發、設計心理學以及通用設計等。教學將以課堂講授、專家座談、個案研討等方式進行，並以報告繳交以及分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories, application and research of User-Centered Design (UCD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UCD, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, usability design and evaluation, user-centered product design and development, design psychology and universal design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 良好的介面設計，能讓使用者快速有效的完成相關操作行為，加強使用過程的正面經驗。本互動程式設計之課程內容旨在專注於以適切的程式撰寫能力，完成介面與使用者有效溝通的相關課題。課程內容包含遠端網路操作介面之程式設計、手持式電子產品之程式設計、大型互動裝置之程式設計等。程式學習如Action Script / JAVA / JSP / ASP / MY SQL / C / C++。
description.en: Good interface design would help users operate efficiently and create a positive experience in the whole operation process. This course focuses on the appropriate programming design ability that establishes an efficient communication between interface and users. Course content includes programming design of remote internet operation interface, handheld electric products, large interactive device, and so forth. Programming acquisition include Action Script / JAVA / JSP / ASP / MY SQL / C / C++.

description.zh: 本課程在探討多媒體技術應用於各互動媒體設計與實作，首先介紹多媒體技術之基本理論及一些處理技巧，其中多媒體影像包含影像編輯、製作、轉換與格式介紹等。為因應研究生的不同專業領域，本課程將強調基本知識的培養與技術的訓練， 例如：有關Photoshop, Illustrator, 3D Max, Sketch up, Flash, After Effects.等技能的養成。
description.en: This course is focused on the application and design practice of interactive digital multimedia technologies. The contents include basic knowledge and techniques on image editing, making, transforming and format introduction. To meets different students' background, this course emphasizes on the understanding of basic training on software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, 3D Max, Sketch up, Flash, and After Effects.

description.zh: 本課程內容包含數位影像處理的基本原理、影像處理，強化技術、壓縮與辨識。其應用性包含影像視覺辨識、影像的壓縮與切割、特徵擷取、濾鏡特效等，其中影像處理領域較廣，特別強調後製、特效等，如Adobe Pixel Bender與After Effect應用。
description.en: The content of this course includes the basic principles of digital video processing, image processing, techniques, compression, and recognition. Applications include pattern recognition, compression and cropping, feature extraction, and optical filter. Video processing emphasizes video post-processing and special effects such as the applications of Adobe Pixel Bender and After Effect.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This seminar focuses on report writing of research, group study, and training of students' research ability.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在學習供應鏈的運籌管理、策略設計、規劃與營運的相關議題，以及瞭解供應鏈中各成員間對於物流、資訊流與金流的活動與管理。課程內容包含：供應鏈的競爭策略擬定、配送網路設計、需求預測、總體規劃、存貨管理、運輸管理、委外決策與規劃、資訊科技應用、與供應鏈協同整合。
description.en: The focus of this course is on the strategic design, planning and operation of a supply chain, as well as the efficient management of the flows of product, information, funds in a supply chain. The content includes the strategic fit between competitive strategies and supply chain strategies of firms, the design of supply chain networks, demand forecasting, aggregate planning, inventory management, transportation management, sourcing decision and planning, information technology, and coordination and integration of supply chain members.

description.zh: 網際網路的變化快速且所使用的技術也日新月益。現今網際網路已成為人們生活中的重要部份。本課程的主要目標在廣泛的介紹網際網路上架構與應用的各種設計觀念。本課程的組成包括以下八類的原理介紹：一、網際網路架構；二、連上網際網路的各種方法；三、網際網路通訊的各種項目；四、WWW；五、網際網路上的各種應用工具；六、網際網路上多媒體應用；七、企業內部網路；八、網際網路上的資訊安全。
description.en: The Internet changes so quickly and the technology advances rapidly. Now, the Internet has become an essential part of our life. The goal of the course is breadth to cover the principles of the Internet. The content of this course is composed of the following eight parts. In Part 1, the underlying basics of the Internet is explained. Part 2 depicts the various ways you can connect your computer to the Internet. Part 3 covers every aspect of Internet communications. Part 4 covers what has become by far the most popular part of the Internet--WWW. Part 5 takes a close look at common Internet tools. Part 6 shows you how some of the various multimedia technologies of the Internet work. Part 7 covers intranets, how the Internet works with the outside world, and how you can shop online. Finally, Part 8 covers security concerns.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Mechatronics in Modern Industries.

name.en: Special Topics on Mechanical & Electric engineering   (一)

description.zh: 包括理論與實驗，由機電所教授共同開課，課程討主要內容介紹機電科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，側重在機電科技與創新設計相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course, conducted by several professors from the Institute of. Mechanical & Electric Engineering introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of mechatronics and advanced technology. The topics covered mainly lie in areas of automation technology, mechatronics, advanced manufacturing technology, air conditioning & refrigeration engineering and vehicle engineering.

description.zh: 由於經濟活動的急遽擴張，大量生產、大量消費的生活型態，產生大量廢棄物，導致環境負擔超過涵容及復原能力，加上台灣地狹人稠，自然資源不豐，造成環境品質惡化及發展遲滯危機，因此，如何突破天然資源限制，開創永續發展動能，以建設舒適美好生活環境，實為當前重要課題。本課程分別從污染防治、生化程序控制、材料製程應用及災害防治等工程技術觀點著手，培養具永續發展之經營管理智能。
description.en: Because of fast economic development of the modern society, our environment has been deteriorated due to the massive waste production from these economic activities.  Therefore, how to recover and provide the best environment from engineering point of view is a very critical issue.  This course will provide specific knowledge base to these advanced students from pollution control, chemical process, disaster prevention and material engineering points of view in order to minimize waste production before, during and after the production process.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

notes: 博班(與工管所合班，825教室)

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程係提供博士生探索在設計領域中進行研究與建構知識的哲學基礎，碩士生經授課教師同意亦可選修。探討議題包括認識論、現象學、實用論、符號交互論與建構論，並比較設計研究與其它領域的研究。修課者將選讀哲學、認識論或理論的重要文獻，以及有關設計哲理的重要文獻，且將本課程的學習成果以參與學術活動或設計競賽等方式發表。
description.en: This is designated as a Doctoral course. Master students may join the course based on approval of the instructor. This course explores the philosophical basis for conducting research and building knowledge in the field of design. Topics to be explored may include core concepts from epistemology, phenomenology, pragmatism, symbolic interactionism and structuralism. Comparisons are made between design research and research in other fields. Each participant in the course will choose key readings: some from works in philosophy, epistemology or theory, and others related to discussions of philosophy in design. The readings may be a book in its entirety or selected chapters from a book that may present a philosophical argument or an extended discussion (of the nature of knowledge, time, actions, experience, cognition, context, technology, language, interactions, artifacts or objects), or one (or more) selected chapter(s) from a compendium or other edited collection of classic and contemporar

description.en: Mechanisms and machine elements, classical dynamics, modern machining methods, electric machines and drivers, sensors, special topics and labs of machatrocics system.

description.en: Introduction, Window operation System, API, DDL, Design of DDE and OLE, Structure of Client/Server System, Multimedia, Image Compression, Graphic supervisory/control system.

description.zh: 本課程分三單元，包括：(1) 應用量子力學：量子力學的基本結構，簡單量子系統，原子、分子及晶體之電子結構與能階，量子躍遷，量子統計，傳輸現象、量子雜訊，晶體能帶結構，量子光學，多體量子系統。(2)奈米材料學：奈米材料之基本性質，奈米材料特殊之物性，奈米材料擴散及燒結特性，特殊奈米材料、CNT製程與應用。(3)奈米顆粒材料：奈米顆粒材料特性，奈米顆粒材料之製程，奈米顆粒材料之檢測分析技術，奈米顆粒材料之光電應用，奈米顆粒材料之熱流應用，奈米顆粒材料之生化應用，奈米顆粒材料專題報告。

description.zh: 課程之目的在於讓學生能夠學習到RFID之電磁相容規範與驗測技術，以培養學生具備RFID EMC實務與驗測之能力。本課程之大綱如下所示：1.電磁相容與RFID簡介2.電磁相容規範3.訊號、雜訊與頻譜4.輻射性電磁干擾5.傳導性放射干擾6.串音干擾7.屏蔽效應8.RFID EMC驗測方法
description.en: The goal of this course for students is to learn the theorem and specification of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) with the verification techniques of RFID. The outlines of the course are: 1.Introduction of EMC and RFID2.Specification of EMC3.Signal, noise and spectrum4.Interference of EM emission5.Interference of conducted emission6.Interference of cross-talk7.Shielding effectiveness8.Verification techniques on EMC of RFID

description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

name.en: Special Topics on Fire Protection Management

description.zh: 本課程主要教授防火管理基本架構，包含燃燒理論，火災特性，防火區劃，防火生活圈，防火計劃與防火管理組織等，並藉由制度化之管理手段技巧教授學生了解防火管理之目的與方法。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on basic concept of fire protection , such as characteristics of fire , district of fire protection , plan and management of fire etc.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛製造課程包含車輛製造現場管理和車輛製造技術流程兩大部分，使學生了解整個汽車製造產業上的設備管理、量產管理和品質管理，以及汽車製造上所需的各種工藝技術，以觸發學生對汽車製造領域的興趣，進而擴大未來在汽車產業的服務機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the spot management and technical operation of vehicle manufacture. Students will understand the fields in facilities management, output management and quality control from this course. Furthermore, the aim of this course is to increase the students' interest and opportunity in the region of vehicle manufacture.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹流體機械設計上之相關理論與其流場行為的分析方法，內容包括流體機械的熱流動力學、翼列間流場理論、軸流式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機)設計與分析、離心式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機) 設計與分析、渦卷式和螺旋式壓縮機設計與分析、電腦輔助流體機械設計。
description.en: This course intends to introduction the design principles of turbomachinery and the methods to analyze the flow behavior. The course contents are: thermo-fluid dynamics aspects of turbomachinery, cascade flow, preliminary design and analysis of xial-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fan), centrifugal-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fans), scroll and screw compressor, the computational aided design of turbomechinery.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
description.en: The main target of this course is to intoduce mathematical methods ot engineering applications; the course will cover areas in differential equations and vecto calculus. This course will also train students in applying mathematics to engineering calculations and research, such as unmerical methods and statistical methods.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對環境工程的領域有關冷凍空調部份作更深入的解說，主要闡述︰1. 室內空調房間微污染控制︰粉塵、氣膠、氣態污染物等。2. 冷媒污染問題︰ＣＦＣ、新冷媒的現狀及展望、溫室效應等。3. 產業空調用有害物質排放及處理技術。4. 產業空調用超純水製造及水之再利用、節水技術。
description.en: This course is concentrated in the area of environment issues which relates to Air Conditioning and Refrigeration. The course therefore encompasses a number of subjects:1.Indoor Air Quality Control: particles, aerosols, temperature, relative humidity etc.  2.CFC issues: the problems of CFC, the current status and future prospect of new refrigerants, green effect etc3.The disposal and treatment of waste materials for industrial HVAC & R applications. 4.The water issues of high-tech industry: ultra-pure water production, water-saving technology, waste water reuse technology etc.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含SPSS、ERIC及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

name.en: Field Test Environment Management and Safety

description.zh: 探討技職學校實習工場規劃、布置、管理場房、設備物料及工場人事等管理事項，以及實習工場安全防護設施與措施，以達到教學研究及安全法規之需求。
description.en: Exploring the best practice of management and safety for field test environment is the purpose of this course.

name.en: Guidance for Vocational and Technical Schools’ Students

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討當代輔導理論、技職教育學生特質，以及各種重要之學生問題如生涯規劃、職業輔導等輔導的原理與方法。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the theories and practice of Counseling for vocational and technical school students. The contents conclude the principles of counseling, characters of students, and the various techniques of counseling.

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.zh: 學校人力資源發展與管理
name.en: Human Resource Development and Management in Schools

description.zh: （一）瞭解學校人力資源發展與管理之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行學校人力資源發展與管理之基本能力。課程內容包括：學校人力資源發展與管理之定義與內涵、人力資源管理與學校效能、學校人力資源發展之需求評估與規劃、教職員工甄選、教職員工的工作動機、教職員工專業發展、教職員工的績效評量、薪資與獎勵及創造高生產力的工作環境等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development and management in schools, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of developing human resource development and management in schools. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development and management in schools, human resource management and effective schools, assessing and planning of human resource development in schools, selecting staffs, motivation of personnel, professional development for educational personnel, evaluating employee performance, compensation and rewards, and creating productive work environments.

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育哲學領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of theories, trends and research in educational philosophy. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

description.zh: 空間結構為一意義之表層結構（表達形式），深層結構為意義表達形式建構之運算規則，自素材中系統地抽取深義部份，統合成一意義深層結構：誘導式結構。此深層結構為一內化於主體之新經驗即情境，為利自身回饋與外在檢驗，深層結構不能外於主、客之交互文字論述建構。邏輯為回饋與外驗二者之有效推理與洞察之建構與檢驗工具，效力建立於置信概率上，因此誘導式結構之建構亦不能脫離於時空之相對合理外。
description.en: Space Structure is the Surface Structure of a represented meaning while H.S.is the Deep Structure and the Constructing Operator of the represented meaning. The Deep Structure was the unity of the significance abstracted from the materials systematically. The Deep Structure as an interiorized experience also called Situation, should not be seperated from the correlative construction of language expond, which will provide the opportunities for the outside inspection and the introspection. Logic is the fundation of the construction and the two-way inspections of the valid reasoning and insight. The validity is based on the credal probability, hence, the H.S.will be restricted in the boundary of Relative Time and Space.Situation as the operator of intuition, will combine the physical materials as a representational formation.

description.zh: 本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：    一、 都市化的萌芽    二、 古典都市    三、 中世紀城鎮    四、 新古典城市    五、 工業革命    六、 都市對比    七、 生活條件提昇    八、 尋求好的都市    九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
description.en: The aim of this course is to encourage students to fulfill their professional potentials and expand their ability to serve the public by a historical context and perspectives. Its content including:  1. The dawn of urbanization  2. The classic city  3. The medieval city  4. The neoclassic city  5. The industrial revolution  6. The city of contrasts  7. Betterment of living conditions  8. Environmental improvement  9. Search for the good city  10. Rebuilding our city and modern social trends

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1)介紹，(2)數位影像基礎，(3)空間域影像強化，(4)頻域影像強化，(5)影像還原，(6)彩色影像處理，(7)形態學影像處理，(8)影像分割，(9)小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

name.en: Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹機器視覺之基本觀念與系統設計、組成機器視覺系統之元件 (攝影機、鏡頭及照明設備等)、重要之照像幾何學與立體測量法，同時介紹二位元影像處理、視覺對準法則、相機校正法、計算視覺與打光技術等重要基礎知識，配合影像處理演算法之介紹，使學員建立完整之機器視覺基礎與概念。(本課程參考麻省理工學院(MIT)之開放式課程)將包含下列主題:o 影像之形成 (Image Formation)o 視覺系統設計 (Vision System Design)o 移動中視覺 (Motion Vision)o 陰影成像法 (Shape from Shading)o 二位元影像處理 (Binary Image Processing)o 照像測量法 (Photogrammetry)o 立體影像 (Stereo Vision)o 對準法則 (Object Representation Alignment)o 相機校正法 (Camera Calibration)o 計算視覺 (Computational Vision)o 打光技術 (Optical Illumination)o 機器視覺之應用 (Applications to robotics and intelligent machine
description.en: This subject provides an introduction to the process of generating asymbolic description of an environment from an image and the fundamentals ofmachine vision and image processing techniques. Lectures include the followingtopics:※ The physics of image formation,※ Vision System Design,※ Motion vision,※ Recovering shapes from shading,※ Shape from Shading,※ Binary image processing,※ Photogrammetry,※ Stereo Vision,※ Object representation alignment,※ Camera Calibration,※ Computational vision,※ Optical Illumination,※ Applications to robotics and intelligent machine interactionTextbook:Horn, Berthold K. P., Robot Vision. Cambridge, MA: MIT Press/McGraw-Hill,March 1986. ISBN: 0262081598.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程，假定他們未具生物學的背。生物程序是應用工程原理，來設計，發展以及採用生物催化劑來解析程序。這些程序可得很多結果，諸如生產期望化合物或分解破壞不要的有害的物質。工程的工具，尤其化學工程將會成功拓展生物程序所必須。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledges of bioprocessing to traditional chemical engineers. No background in biology is assumed. Biopocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze process using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The touls of the engineer, particularly the chemical engineer will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

description.zh: 研究期刊內容，針對學生之學習，提出研究心得閱讀報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹薄膜製作有關的基礎理論與技術。講述內容包括真空技術，薄膜基礎，薄膜製作技術，蝕刻技術，薄膜評估方法以及薄膜技術的應用等。讓學生認識薄膜在高科技產業上的應用與其重要性，製作薄膜的方法與技術以及其未來的發展。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Thin films technology and Thin film materials science. 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films.

description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解管理會計的技巧與成本管理的觀念。在介紹過營收報表、損益平衡表、現金流動表後，本課程將探討資產管理、資金結構、資金運轉、創投資金、股息策略、利潤分析等議題。課程中亦將論及利用這些財務數據做為決策根據的作法。
description.en: This course teaches students the conceptual understanding of managerial accounting skills and cost management. After the introduction of income statement, balance sheet, cash flow statement, this course will examine the topics that include asset management, capital structure, capital budgeting, venture capital, dividend policy, profit analysis, etc. The use of these financial data towards decision-making will be evaluated and discussed.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理、物流、金流及通關等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course intends to discuss some important issues regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics environment around the world, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, performance evaluation and other global logistics related topics, like global supply chain management and global logistic flow. Besides, this course will provide the opportunity of case study for the purpose of  emphasizing on both the theoretical and practical issues.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新" 研發流程管理以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，研發與管理思維更要突破創新，以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。創新研發管理課程;以詳細介紹產品與服務研發流程與組織架構、產品與服務策略與規劃、確認與掌握客戶需求、產品與服務規格定義與確認、產品與服務概念開發與測試、品質與目標成本設計、產品研發流程之突破創新機會點(前端預防設計)、解決問題之創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)等主題。瞭解TRIZ如何應用於系統化創新構思並解?矛盾問題，快速激發最可能解?指定問題之TRIZ創新原則與指導方向，解?之問題包含工程與管理策略亦適用，TRIZ管理實務案例包含研發管理、生產管理、服務業管理、專案管理。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in an innovative thinking manner for product R&D management process, including product planning, concept development, system design, detail design, testing and refinement, and ramp-up production. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 12 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, project management, service industry management, and production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students involving creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

description.zh: 程式語言為計算機軟體之基礎，本課程主要探討程式語言之類型以及各種語言之設計原理與特色，經由對這些原理及特色之了解，程式設計師便可針對各類應用之特性選擇最合適之語言。本課程內容包括：1.程式語言之發展與分類，2.設計原理，3.語法與語意，4.資料型態，5.控制結構，6.正規語言，7.抽象資料型態，8.物件導向程式語言，9.函式語言，10.邏輯語言，11.平行處理語言。

Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

description.zh: 本課程將介紹電腦多媒體系統的發展。不同的媒體種類的處理以及相關的技術與概念，將在本課程中作介紹。其中包括電腦圖學，電腦動畫，電腦聲音與音樂，以及電腦視訊。商用的多媒體系統，以及研究階段的多媒體作家系統，也將涵蓋在課程的範圍之中。對多媒體的現今技術與未來，作系統性的討論與說明。課程大綱:多媒體系統簡介，多媒體市場，多媒體套裝，基本媒體--聲音，視訊，影像，動畫，文字；整合環境與套裝--書頁模式，連結模式，邏輯編排模式，展示模式；未來趨勢。
description.en: This course will look the multimedia development in computer science domain. Various media, such sound, video, graphic and animation, will be examined first to illustrate their usage in a computerized environment. Commercial packages will be employed to exercise the multimedia application in selected areas thereafter. Course Outline: Introduction to Multimedia; Multimedia Market; Multimedia Production Packages; Basic Media (Basics & Hardware/Software) - Audio, Video, Image, Animation, Text; Composition Environment/Packages -- Page-Oriented, Node-Link Oriented, Scripting, Demonstration; Future Trend.

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 數學基礎	- 機率	- 隨機程序：自相關函數與功率密度函數，高斯程序、白雜訊	- 正交開展與線性濾波	- 取樣與量化3. 最佳接收器設計	- 信號的幾何表示	- 最大事後機率與最大可能接收原理	- 相配濾波器	- 錯誤機率4. 數位調變與多工技術	- 數位調變：振幅移鍵調變、相位移鍵調變、四相振幅調變、頻率移鍵調變	- 數位調變的取捨條件：錯誤機率、功率、頻寬與複雜度	- 多工技術：分頻多工、分時多工、分碼多工5. 消息理論簡介	- 源編碼與熵	- 通道編碼與通訊容量

description.zh: 1.傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2.離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3.Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。

name.zh: 電腦在營建管理之應用
name.en: The Application of Computer in Construction Management

description.zh: 本課程主要自營建工程專案之觀點，介紹一些常用營建專案管理方法之基本原理及其在電腦上之應用實例。課程內容將包含營建專案之進度、成本、品質等基本管理概念與營建管理理論於專案管理之初步應用，使學生能實際地學習如何將電腦應用在營建工程專案管理(內容包括：工程排程、成本估算與控制、電腦模擬、與工程風險管理分析等方法)。
description.en: The application of computer in construction managementThe basic knowledge in computer, the basic design thought and current system practical training in Chinese-English word process system , the functional explain and application in EXCEL, the basic concept in information management system , the basic concept in engineer information management system , the design of database and database software system's practice, simple application in statistics drafting software and other current computer's technology development and other application in construction management.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。
本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，除了相關的法令之外，亦包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系等
description.en: This course is to introduce the principles of 4R in the waste management. In addition to related regulations, contents of this course include pollution prevention approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目的，在使學生對污水系統有整體之設計概念，使其未來在實務工作時，了解如何著手進行設計一具水準、經濟、高效益之污水下水道系統。課程內容包括： 1.污水下水道系統規則 2.管線系統設計 3.抽水設施設計 4.污水處理方法之選擇 5.污水處理設施(除油、攔污、沈砂)設計 6.初沈池設計 7.各種生物處理法設計 8.終沈池、浮除設計 9.三級處理設計 10.污泥濃縮設計 11.污泥消化設計 12.污泥脫水、焚化設計 13.污水處理廠配置設計 14.污水處理廠水力計算 15.污水處理機械設備及儀控系統選擇 16.污水處理廠機械動力設計 17.污水處理廠附屬設備設計
description.en: This course provides a general design concept of wastewater treatment system, and enables students to understand how to design a wastewater treatment system with high quality, economic and efficiency. The contents of the course include rules of sewerage system, design of piping system, design of pumping ststem, design of the facilities of sewage treatment, unit operation and unit process design of biological unit system, and design of advanced sewage treatment, etc.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對物化處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括化學反應動力學、高等氧化還原程序、薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序等之應用。
description.en: This course will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of Physicochemical treatment process rather than operations, thus encompassing quality transformation in natural waters, water supply, and municipal and industrial wastewaters.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

description.zh: 第一章 陶瓷製程概論1.1陶瓷產品1.2陶瓷製程特色1.3目前瞭解程度　　第二章 固. 液 氣三相反應　2.1三相反應2.2乾燥第三章 粉末特性評估　　　 3.1名詞定義3.2粉末規格3.3熱化與熱物分析3.4粉末之密度　　　第四章 成形前處理之製程　　4.1粉碎4.2混合4.3成團第五章 成形製程5.1乾壓法5.2注漿法5.3塑性成形法第六章 膠體狀態與穩定6.1固液相界面6.2帶電界面6.3穩定態6.4流變性質第七章 懸浮液系統7.1水懸浮液7.2泥漿性質7.3牛頓型懸浮液7.4有抗粘劑容液流變性質第八章 濕製程8.1壓濾製程8.2離心製程8.3注漿製程8.4乳化及發泡製程8. 5其他
description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 地下水為地球上可資利用且蘊藏最豐富之淡水資源，本課程以介紹地下水文相關理論及實務為主，有助於學生了解地下水之開發利用與經營管理。課程內容包括地下水之來源、流動及開發應用，以及各項天然或人為化學汙染對地下水系統質與量之影響評估 。
description.en: This course is concerned with the theory and practice of hydrology, the science of water in subsurface environments which are helpful for groundwater resource exploitation and management. It is divided into two main parts: (1) basic concepts dealing with the origin, movement of groundwater, and its recovery from wells, and (2) a qualitative and quantitative assessment of the chemistry of natural and contaminated systems.

description.zh: 水文遙測主要之目的為藉由衛星及飛機等的儀器收集地表對不同波長之反射特性，並加以分析，因此可用於國土監測及防災等。藉由波長反射的特性可率訂所需的參數，將可用於大尺度的模擬，如地表能量平衡、地表水文、土地利用、植物指標、地表溫度、輻射通量及地表土壤濕度等。
description.en: Observations by instruments on board satellites provide data on radiative characteristics of the earth's surface at various wavelengths.  From these characteristics, one may determine parameters of interest for large-scale modeling of the earth's energy balance and surface hydrology, for instance land use, vegetation indices, surface temperature, radiative fluxes, and surface soil moisture.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

name.en: Special Topics on Construction Project Management

description.zh: 本課程主要針對營建管理領域重要課題以及營建時事進行分析探討，透過課題分析、報告以及討論，增進學生對於營建管理領域相關課題之了解及認知，進而思考日後可能面對的類似課題。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation drill of build engineering        Discuss and analyze subjects of construction         management domain and current issue. By the subjects         analysis, reports and discussion, students can          improve their abilities of understanding the         construction management domain, and thinking of         similar subjects they may have later.

description.zh: 科學視算指的是將大量的運算資料、監測結果或實驗數據，結合電腦繪圖以視覺化的方式呈現出來，幫助研究者進一步瞭解大量數據背後所代表的工程意義，在本課程中將介紹科學視算的原理，教導所使用的軟體工具和繪圖函式庫，讓學生有機會瞭解科學視算在土木工程上的應用，並以案例介紹科學視算的用途，如結構物的地震振動反應、震波在地層中的傳遞狀況、地形特徵和GPS資料的視覺化模擬、以及板塊運動的模擬情形等。本課程先修課程為程式設計，並且最好具備有限元素法的概念，建議研究所同學選修。
description.en: Scientific visualization is the use of computer graphics to visually represent the composite meaning of the large amount of data obtained by scientific computation, extensive monitoring, or engineering experiments. It could help researchers quickly grasp the engineering implications in their field of interest. This course will introduce the basic theory of scientific visualization, teach the relevant programming skills, and demonstrate how to apply the principles of scientific visualization to civil engineering problems. Examples include the seismic response of engineering structures, the propagation of seismic waves in the ground, and the movement of tectonic plates. The prerequisite of this course is computer programming. It is suitable for graduate students to choose as an elective.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 中文課程概述： 本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

name.zh: 建築生命周期管理特論

description.zh: 本課程主要探討整體建築生命周期(從企劃、設計、施工、使用維護、改建、解體再利用等)之管理科學的理論以及實際管理的操作手法。授課內容如下面內容所示:專題討論內容     ■ 專案管理的基本概念與思想、建築專案的諸管理活動■ 建築物的生命週期管理(LCM)與經濟性■ 建築專案環境計畫的理論與實績(EMS)■ 建築專案之營運與設施管理計畫(FM)■ 建築專案的renovation管理手法 (RM)■ 建築部品及組件的物流與供應鏈管理(SCM)■ 建築相關知科技整合(Technology fusion)與技術管理科學(MOT)■ 建築專案管理的整合與課題
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the complete theories of the management of building projects, regarding whole achitectural lifecycle(from planning, design, construction, maintenance, re-construction, to dismantling and material reusage), and its actual implementation methods. Its contents include fundamental concepts and ideas in Project Management, the rating modes and case studies of LifeCycle Management, and introduction to the Management of Technology & Technology Fusion concept that has become widely popular among foreign academics. The scoring for this curriculum will be based upon either two hand-in reports or open-book exams.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像

Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.
