name.en: Forum on Service and Technology Management

description.zh: 本課程主要邀請學術界或企業界的學者專家，從理論或實務的角度，經由演講介紹近代的服務與科技管理專題，促使學生更深入及廣面瞭解管理現狀或趨勢。
description.en: This seminar course invites guest speakers from well known companies to share their experiences of service and technology management and provide students the updated practices and management trends in the field.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖種類及特性 3.訊號的退化 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.數位傳輸系統 8.光固子及DWDM系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

description.zh: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 本課程著重食品冷凍之原理、設備、儲存及應用技術，使學生深入了解食品冷凍之精髓。課程涵蓋︰（1） 食品儲存方式與設備。（2） 食品微生物理論（3） 各種食品之冷凍方式與原理（4） 工業食品冷凍系統（5） 食品冷凍運輸之方法和技術（6） 超低溫食品冷凍技術
description.en: This course is concentrated in the fundamentals facility storage and application technology of food refrigeration.  The students should be familiar with the principles of food refrigeration after these lectures.     The topics of this course are:(1) Food storage and equipment.(2) Food microbiology and refrigeration.(3) Refrigerating technology of various food products.(4) Industrial food freezing systems.(5) Distribution technology of chilled and frozen food.(6) Cryogenics in food refrigeration.

description.zh: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 透過理論及實務配合講解，並輔以實例觀察，課程以能源經濟理論為講授架構，講解能源經濟之特性及型態，並介紹我國能源政策訂訂原則及內涵，以使學生能對能源產業及能源政策有整體性瞭解，讓學生得以學以應用，為以後升學、就業或進入政府部門服務奠下良好基礎。
description.en: This course is to teach the theory of energy economic and strategy. Through the lecture of theory and real case study, students can learn the characteristics and type of energy industry and the principles and contents of energy strategy. Students can understand the energy market and energy strategy for studying in the graduate school, entering companies, and servicing for the government department.

description.zh: 本課程從基礎聲學開始介紹電聲元件的原理，進而講授電聲元件揚聲器及麥克風、電聲元件的類比電路分析法、音箱設計、電聲元件的量測方法以及音箱設計軟體的應用，帶引學生進入電聲學的領域。
description.en: This course first introduces principles of electro-acoustic transducers from fundamental acoustics. Then topics in the lectures including introduction of moving-coil loudspeaker and microphone, analog circuits analysis method for  electro- acoustic transducers , loudspeaker enclosure design, measurement test of electro-acoustic transducers and the application of loudspeaker enclosure design software. The aim of this course is to bring students into the field of Electro-Acoustics.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 一般人對染顏料的概念是可經由著色製程賦予物質色澤，然而近二十年來因為電子與複印產業的興起，使得染顏料在高科技產業的應用受到重視。雖然仍是利用染顏料具有選擇性的吸收可見光的能力，但仍因不同產業而有額外的要求。本課程即是探討應用於高科技之染顏料的性能以及結構式的關係。
description.en: The traditional use of organic colourants is to impart color to a substrate such as textiles, paper, plastics, and leather. However, in the last twenty years or so organic colorants have become increasingly important in the high-technology (hi-tech) industries of electronics and particularly reprographics.These hi-tech applications present many challenges to the dyestuff chemist to devise dyes to meet the often demanding criteria required. This course describes how those challenges are being met in the important electronics and reprographics technologies. It also illustrates the vital role that organic colorants play in these application. Indeed, it gives a chemist's view rather than a physicist's or engineer's view of the electronics and reprographics technologies.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象, 介面反應等與近代高科技技術, 如鍍膜工程,表面處理, 腐蝕, 磨潤, 微機電, 感測器, 半導體技術等息息相關, 且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究, 它包括振動, 電子或離子頻譜分析, 微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含, 表面形貌觀察( SEM, BSEM, AFM ), 成份分析( 光譜分析, 質譜分析, EDX ), 結構分析( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析( Raman光譜, FTIR ), 表面粗糙度, 膜厚, 附著力, 內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 簡介﹙廣義的逆向工程系統、狹義的逆向工程系統﹚，數位擷取設備﹙接觸式探頭、非接觸式探頭﹚，曲面模型﹙電腦圖學簡史、3D電腦繪圖、Bezier曲線、NURBS曲線曲面﹚，逆向工程軟體之功能，電腦輔助檢驗，軟硬體整合與實作。
description.en: Introduction, Digitizing Devices (Tactile Probes, Non-contact Probes), Surface Modeling (Computer Graphics, 3D Rendering, Bezier Curve, NURBS Surface),Curve and Surface Editing, Computer Aided Verification.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

notes: 管理組/產學合作中心201教室

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在導引學生了解教師專業的相關概念與理論，協助學生探究教師專業的基本素養與評量標準，以及教師生涯各階段專業發展的再精進策略。
description.en: This course is to guide students to understand the relevant concepts and theories on teacher professionals；to explore the basic literacy of teachers and assessment of professional criteria；to investigate  the successful strategies of professional development for teachers in different career stages.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項‧
description.en: This course has provided: money and capital market、Investments 、How to obtaining and using funds、Maximize the value o their firms、How to maximize stockholders' stock、To know agency problem 、To know the price of the firm's stock, use of debt and dividend policy.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

description.zh: 本課程整合心理學、社會學、 決策行為學等理論，介紹消費者的產品購買思維，以及產品消費行為，並討論企業如何應用消費 者行為分析的各項研究發現與理論，以提高行銷規劃與市場活動 效能。課程內容包括：1.消費購買的行為模式。2.消費行為的心理學與社會學基礎。3.消費者認知過程與心理發展。4.社會互動關係與購買行為。5.產品涉入對消費行為的影響。6.情境因素對消費行為的影響。7.態度的形成與改變。8.消費者行為分析在行銷管理的應用。學生修習本課程之後，將對行銷規劃之主要變數，如產品設計、零售企劃、廣告促銷、定價策略等，有一扎實的行為科學方面的理論基礎。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to help the student develop a good grasp of the variables that affect consumption and the implications of this knowledge for actual business decisions. Among the more specific goals, the course should improve the student's ability to: 1. Understand the sociological and psychological variables that shape the consumer decision process, 2. Identify various ways to segment a consumer market, 3. Examine the target market before making marketing-related decisions, 4. Identify new business opportunities, 5. Appreciate a variety of techniques for changing attitudes, 6. Learn how to maximize satisfaction and customer loyalty, and 7. Apply a knowledge of consumer behavior to a variety of entities ranging from non-profit organizations to e-commerce.

description.zh: 這是行銷管理的進階課程，本課程主要目的在於：1.	瞭解行銷理論的主要議題。2.	瞭解行銷思想的歷史與演進。3.	瞭解科學對行銷學的影響。4.	幫助找尋可能的行銷論文研究主題。培養加強科學研究的能力等。
description.en: This course is designed to: 1.	consider major contemporary issues in marketing theory, 2.	understand the history and evolution of marketing thought, 3.	understand the fundamental issues involved in the philosophy of science and its impact on marketing inquiry, 4.	search for possible thesis topics or evaluate your preliminary thesis proposal, enhance the ability to conduct scientifically respectable research and to evaluate research in a professional-critical manner.

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Branding Management builds on Global branding Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.

description.zh: 公司治理在商業的過程中扮演核心角色，提供公司目標及策略上的協助並助其達成期望。也提供讓員工共事的價值觀即確保企業永續經營的收支平衡。在現階段競爭時代當中，本課程除提供同事專業知識外，並以此讓學生瞭解企業運作之道。 ◆公司治理定義與演進 ◆公司治理關鍵議題 ◆公司治理演進 ◆公司治理模式 ◆公司治理架構 ◆公司治理應用 ◆公司治理維持與發展。
description.en: Corporate governance is the combination of legal and political governance mechanisms external to the firm, along with monitoring and incentive governance mechanisms internal to the firm, linked and driven by the forces of investment markets, to produce value-increasing outcomes for firms' owners and, ultimately, society at large. In this course, we will survey corporate governance, taking the investor's point of view. By the end of the course, you should have a well-informed understanding of the basic corporate governance problem and the major issues in corporate governance, prominent proposed solutions to the corporate governance problem, the way the problem is actually addressed in a variety of companies and countries, and evidence on the prospects for and drawbacks of the various solutions. This course is therefore comprised of distinct intellectual components-the practice and the science-which are intertwined throughout the semester's activities.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹投資決策管理之理論與實務，內容涵蓋投資專案管理、企業投資價值評量與金融投資管理等主題，目的在培養同學有關實體專案投資與金融投資之理論與評價技術。
description.en: I. Introduction II. Portfolio Theory and Practice III. Equilibrium in Capital Markets IV. Fixed-Income Securities.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討效率市場假說下的異常現象，本課程以文獻討論為主，並且用心理學的理論來加以解釋投資人在金融市場的行為模式。
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence of the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged in the past two decades. Behavioural finance has developed as an approach to try to explain financial market anomalies from the EMH. The aim of this course is to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to integrate the most resent thinking about organization design with classic and traditional ideas and theories. This course covers the following three major parts: Part 1: organization and organization theories Part 2: organization structure and design Part 3: new thinking of organization design in the Internet era, Part IV case study.

description.zh: 本課程介紹許多有關於組織中的個人、團隊與組織交互作用的研究。明確地說，本課程內容主要在探討如何改善員工績效與利社會行為，降低缺勤與離職率，以及提高工作滿足與組織承諾等員工態度。
description.en: This course introduces a variety of researches that investigates the interactions between individuals, groups, and organization. Specifically, it focuses on how to improve employee performance and prosocial behaviors, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and enhance job attitudes such as job satisfaction and organizational commitment.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation.

name.zh: 迴歸分析理論探討與應用
name.en: The Theoretical Study on Regression Analysis and Its Applica

description.zh: 本課程引導學生深入研究"簡單線性迴歸"與"複迴歸"的理論基礎、技巧與用法、以及在企業管理上的應用。課程內容包含：（1）簡單線性迴歸；（2）迴歸模式適合性的推論；（3）利用迴歸模式的預測；（4）線性迴歸的應用；（5）迴歸模式假設條件的檢定；（6）複迴歸模式；（7）質量性獨立變數的處置；（8）共線性的探測；與（9）逐步迴歸分析法。課程中亦將對值得研究的議題及方向加以說明。
description.en: This course takes the students into the in-depth study on the "simple linear regression" and the "multiple regression" in terms of their theoretical background, techniques, and the applications in business. Topics covered by this course are: (1) Simple linear regression, (2) Inference based on fitted regression model, (3) prediction based on fitted regression model, (4) Application of simple linear regression, (5) Verification of regression assumption, (6) Multiple regression, (7) Qualitative independent variables, (8) Multicollinearity, and (9) Stepwise regression. Topics and directions warrant future researches will also be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性的相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。
description.en: The topics of this course include interactivity, and virtual experience, virtual community, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對口碑行銷相關議題有更深入的瞭解，包括 1.口碑的定義、 2.口碑廣告、 3.正負面口碑、 4.口碑與網路行銷、 5.口碑與市場導向、 6.口碑與品牌、 7.口碑與行銷策略等、 8. 社會互動、 9.及學生有興趣研究的口碑與行銷主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding word of mouth marketing. Topics are as follows: 1. Definition of word of mouth, 2. Word of mouth advertising, 3. Positive and negative word of mouth, 4. Word of Mouth and Internet Marketing, 5. Word of mouth and Market Orientation, 6. Word of mouth and Brand Management, 7. Word of mouth and Marketing Strategy, 8. Social Interactions, 9. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

description.zh: 本課程教授之內容將著重在行銷領域上各種分析工具的實際運用。這些分析工具包括傳統統計分析技術：集群分析、區別分析、鑑別分析、因素分析、、聯合分析、羅吉斯迴歸鑑別、人工智慧方法、決策樹等方法。
description.en: Development and application of advanced marketing research topics including cluster analysis, classification analysis, discriminant analysis, factor analysis, multidimensional scaling and conjoint analysis, multi-nominal logit analysis, positioning analysis, decision tree analysis, geodemographic site planning and promotional spending analysis.

description.zh: 本課程係研析公司現有市場或潛在市場的顧客，致使買者滿足期望和獲得更多產品或服務的價值問題。價值行銷鏈不同於波特的價值鏈，它是推動組織對顧客友善的策略與程序，發展長期價值，以貢獻到組織。課程內容聚焦9項連結：(1)價值創造的原則；(2)價值行銷導向；(3)價值行銷策略；(4)建立品牌權益；(5)價值代替價格；(6)價值行銷鏈；(7)價值溝通與傳輸；(8)價值基準的網路行銷；(9)對上述步驟的結果評價。
description.en: Value Marketing: the idea is that only when buyers expect and obtain more value than they have to pay for the product or service in question will they become and remain customers. The Value Marketing Chain differs from Porter's value chain in that it pull strategy and process to the customer closer and to the organization, to develop metrics to help value marketing's contribution, and to assess the effect of these strategies in developing long-term value for the organization. This course focus in 9 links: (1) Principles of value creation. (2) The marketing value driver. (3) Value-based marketing Strategy. (4) Building Brand Equity. (5) Pricing for value. (6) The value marketing chain (7) Value-based Communications and deliveries. (8) Value-based Internet marketing. (9) Evaluating the results of these steps.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討如何運用賽局理論來分析企業經營策略，研究理性決策者互動的策略選擇。整個過程牽涉到了關於衝突、合作以及溝通的分析，並透過貼切而有趣的例子來說明賽局理論的豐富意涵。應用領域包括：商業競爭、政治、戰爭與選舉、生物學、電腦科學與網路等。
description.en: This course mainly talks about how to utilize game theory to analyze business strategies between players and study the strategic interactions of rational decision makers. The process involves the analysis of conflict, cooperation and tacit communication. The beauty of game theory is revealed and illustrated by pertinent and interesting examples drawn from various fields. Application areas include business competition, politics, war and election, biology, computer science and network etc.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

name.en: Modern Waveguide Circuits and Its Applications

description.zh: 本課程針對目前廣泛使用之平面型波導電路進行理論分析與設計，它是將大學部所學之「高頻電子電路」、「電波工程導論」、「微波積體電路設計導論」等課程，進一步應用至實際且常見之各式高頻積體電路。中文概述1.電磁波理論複習2.傳輸線理論3.微波網路分析4.平面型傳輸線特性5.波導電路理論6.平面型電路組件英文概述1.	Review of Electromagnetic Wave Theory2.	Transmission Line Theory 3.	Microwave Network Analysis4.	Characteristics of Planar Transmission Lines5.	Waveguide Circuit Theory6.	Planar Circuit Components
description.en: 1.Review of Electromagnetic Wave Theory2.Transmission Line Theory 3.Microwave Network Analysis4.Characteristics of Planar Transmission Lines5.Waveguide Circuit Theory6.Planar Circuit Components

name.en: Green House Gas Management and Practice

description.zh: 氣候變遷儼然已為全球邁入21世紀所面對最嚴峻國際環保課題，對非聯合國氣候變化綱要公約締約國及屬於外銷型新興工業國家的台灣，正處在發展轉捩點上，為維持國家競爭力，國內應擬訂更積極之節能減碳政策，並著手研擬調適衝擊方案，同時加強與國際間合作，進行減碳政策、技術與經驗交流，以推動碳市場之國際接軌，並確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展。本課程將介紹溫室氣體與氣候變遷之關連性、國際溫室氣體管制相關公約、我國溫室氣體管理現況、溫室氣體減量政策與經濟工具、及溫室氣體衝擊調適與節能新技術等，期藉由本課程使之瞭解全球暖化成因與後果與國內外溫室氣體管理現況與法規要求，以提升我國於氣候變遷因應之認知。
description.en: This class introduces scientific, economic, and ecological issues about the threat of global climate change, and the Policy Instruments of greenhouse gas management.  This course examines the interconnections of international politics and climate change.  It includes Green House Gas inventory, carbon tax and emission trading, Voluntary approach and other greenhouse gas management policy tools.  It explores an integrated approach to analysis the benefits of greenhouse gas and air pollution reduction measures, and related model development.

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究. 有關科技開發案之技術開發管理, 人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 開課：機電、製科所合開（上學期）(含一般生、在職生)本課程說明RFID系統架構，技術、編碼、和應用標準，資訊系統，效益評估，隱私權問題，及各領域或產業的創新應用和案例。
description.en: This course is to explain the RFID system structure, the standard of technology, object coding and applications, IT solution systems, ROI considerations, privacy issues, and then the innovative applications in different field or industry.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies.  Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧，正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 1.機率簡介 2.機率分佈 3.統計概論 4.抽樣分析 5.參數估計 6.區間估計 7.假設檢定 8.迴歸分佈 9.統計品管 10.變異分析
description.en: Introduction to probability Probability distribution Introduction to statistics Sampling analysis Quality control

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 資源工程導論為資源工程的入門學科，其範圍包括天然的金屬、非金屬、礦物與石油、天然氣、建築用砂石、石材與水等原生資源，以及工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的可再生資源。期對初學者有一整體的基本概念。
description.en: This is a general introduction class to provide student basic knowledge about resources engineering which include metal, nonmetal, minerals, petroleum, natural gas, aggregates, dimension stone and water resources.

description.zh: 課程上設計了兩大部分，一為生物技術產業概論-基礎；另一為生物技術產業概論-進階。基礎部分以分析化學為切入點，再進入蛋白質與酵素之生化領域，再擴展到各種大小分子的整合應用，最後引進細胞與組織工程的建構；接下來再以各重要特化領域，進行分項介紹，包含特用化學品、食品科學、醫療藥品與植物科學，期待學員們能確時掌握各項領域之技術與應用。進階部分以最具發展潛力之生物工業、植物食品、生物晶片、基因體學、蛋白質體學、幹細胞為六大標的，各分為Part A：介紹各產業中相對應用之相關生物技術；Part B：針對各型產業之市場進行介紹與討論；Part C：進行生物技術產業案例之專題討論，務求學員由實務中得到知識也獲取寶貴經驗，以面對迷人又深具挑戰的生物科技產業。
description.en: The course is divided into two sections: (1) Fundamental of industry of biotechnology and (2) Advance of industry of biotechnology. Section (1) gives a general introduction from the aspect of analytical chemistry that covers protein chemistry and enzymology, micro- and macromolecule, tissue engineering, fine chemicals, food science, pharmaceutical and botanical sciences. Section (2) covers topics on bioindustry, nutritional science, bio-chip development, proteomics, protein science and stem cell research, in which the content is divided into three subparts namely, Part A An overview of technologies used in each topic; Part B An introduction to markets and trends; Part C Case study. We hope all participants will gain insight on today's biotechnology and get ready to meet future challenges.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

description.zh: 教學目標融合本系之特色，強化學生在熱流學領域上之智識與能力，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。課程簡介1.	流體的輸送特性與熱力特性簡介2.	流體流動之基本定律3.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流4.	低溫系統之介紹5.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，6.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，7.	強迫對流分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳8.	自然對流分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流熱傳9.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰
description.en: Thermal Sciences for Cryogenics  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Introduction of fluid transport and thermodynamic properties2.	Basic laws of fluid flow3.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts4.	Introduction to cryogenic systems5.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat conduction analysis6.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat conduction analysis7.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and laminar heat transfer in ducts8.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 9.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 生質能源(bioenergy)指的是儲存在現有(活著或剛失去生命)的動植物體的能量。生質能源的來源，主要是植物將太陽能經由光合作用轉換成葡萄糖，在進一步合生物高分子衍生物(如多醣體(polysaccharides)) 。新一代生質能源技術強調環保技術，整合跨領域之技術，包含應用分子生物技術所發展出之基因轉殖、醱酵控制及生物觸媒技術-利用生物酵素進行催化化學反應達成環保及高效率與節能之目的。本課程將介紹動植物的多醣體種類及如何運用新興生物系統學的技術開發生質能源。
description.en: Bioenergy is referred to the energy stored in living or recently living biological organisms, such as animals, plants and microbes. The source of bioenergy can be traced back from plants harvesting the sunlight and converting it to glucose, then to other biopolymers such as polysaccharides. The technologies for developing bioenergy, with an emphasis on environmentally compatible, consist of gene cloning technology from molecular biology and enzymatic control and catalytic chemistry (i.e. green chemistry).  The course is an introduction course on the types of polysaccharides in animals and plants, how scientist use system biology to develop bioengergy.

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何將電化學技術應用於生物燃料電池上。生物燃料電池的觸媒主要是由酵素或是微生物甚至是生物細胞所組成，反應過程區分為電子直接轉移(mediatorless)與間接轉移(mediator)，並介紹此各種生物燃料電池的原理及應用，個別討論電池之反應過程、電池電極材料、電化學修飾電極及各種不同電池電解質溶液等個別元件。
description.en: The aim and purpose of this course is to introduce and expand the electrochemistry to develop the biofuel cells. Generally the catalysts of biofuel cell are composed by enzymes, microbial, creature cells and the bio-reduction process. In the biofuel cells the reaction process can be distinguished into mediator less and mediator transfer process. In this course, we will introduce the principle, reaction process and the application of biofuel cells. Especially, a detailed study about the utilization of film modified electrodes and different electrolyte solutions for the development of biofuel cells.

description.zh: 本課程介紹半導體製程整合之相關技術。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to give students background in the semiconductor process integration.

name.zh: 譯學新趨勢與翻譯實踐
name.en: New Trends in Translation Studies and Translation Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹20世紀90年代之後翻譯研究興起的「全球化轉向」與「社會學轉向」兩大新趨勢，並深入探討其對翻譯實踐與譯者專業素養所可能帶來的啟示。課程欲含括之翻譯議題如下：（1）全球化轉向-全球化與本土化張力、跨文化溝通、文化認同、權力關係、譯者中介、科技與翻譯、翻譯商品化、非專業翻譯；（2）社會學轉向-翻譯的社會因素（如社會制約與機制）、譯者的社會層面（如譯者角色、慣習與網絡）、翻譯過程的社會學研究（如品質管控、編修與團隊翻譯）。除論文之研讀外，亦將透過翻譯實例的分析（包括新聞、字幕、旅遊、廣告、網頁、商業與文學翻譯等實例），讓學生明瞭這些新趨勢如何引導翻譯實踐，並使其重新省思譯者的專業素養。此外，英漢/漢英翻譯實作與譯評亦為授課重點，期藉此協助學生與時並進，構思適切的翻譯策略。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the "globalization turn" and "sociological turn" in translation studies after the 1990s. An exploration will also be made into their possible implications for translation practice and the translator's qualifications. Translation issues to be addressed may include the following: (1) the globalization turn - the tension between globalization and localization, cross-cultural communication, cultural identity, power relations, the translator's mediation, technology and translation, the commoditization of translation services and non-professional translation (such as fansubbing and scanlation); (2) the sociological turn - socio factors of translation (e.g. social constraints and mechanisms), social aspects of the translator's profession (e.g. the translator's role, habitus and network), and the sociology of the translating process (e.g. quality control, revision and team translation). name.zh: 英文詞彙學與詞彙語用學
name.en: Phraseology and Lexical Pragmatics in English

description.zh: 此課程旨在因應高階英語文學習者的需要，協助他們得到近乎英美人士的語言知識。詞彙學與詞彙語用學為一事（亦即真實世界溝通的詞彙使用方式）之兩面。此兩層面是適當理解與運用自然語言的關鍵。詞彙學討論語言的約定俗成模式，譬如無所不在的固定/習慣性表達以及妥貼的字詞搭配方式。另一方面，詞彙語用學是關於創新而主流、重複出現的詞彙變化模式。近年來成長迅速的詞彙語用學在於探究詞彙的流動性及其基底修辭功能，諸如意義窄化、擴充、演變、偏離、轉換等現象。經由此課程，學生將獲得包含詞彙單位及其意義聯想、指認、使用情境的知識層面。
description.en: This course aims to meet the needs of advanced learners of English who are in the pursuit of near-native knowledge. Phraseology and lexical pragmatics are the two sides of one coin, namely, the lexical use in real-world communication. Both aspects are key to the proper interpretation and production of a language in its natural use. Phraseology addresses the conventional patterns of language use, such as the pervasiveness of formulaic/idiomatic expressions and appropriate collocations. On the other hand, lexical pragmatics concerns itself with the creative and at the same time mainstream, re-occurring patterns of lexical variations. The recent rapidly growing area of lexical pragmatics explores lexical dynamics as well as their underpinning rhetorical functions, such as phenomena of meaning narrowing, expansion, evolution, deviation, modification, etc. Through this course, students are expected to acquire facets of knowledge including lexical/phraseological units and their meaning assoc

The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。

description.en: Basic Electrical Engineering training for students with Mechanical Engineering major. The goal of this course is to get familiar with the building blocks of electrical systems in Mechatronic applications. Major topics include Electrical machines, Motor Drives, Power Amplifiers, Power Electronics, and OP-Amp related signal processing circuits. Lectures are given to illustrate the function of the each block in electrical systems. And then the students can conduct experiment to explore relevant circuits in order to obtain thorough understanding of their characteristics.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.en: The purpose of this course is try to help students prepare to operate in and contribute to the 21st century. Regardless of whether a person intends to work in a business, for the government, or in a nonprofit organization, the concepts, strategies, and techniques of effective marketing are relevant. This course is:Providing from fundamental concepts through the major tasks associated with marketing to the strategic role of marketing in an organization.Bringing early attention to the global nature of marketing.Emphasizing the similarities as well as the differences between consumer and business marketing.Combining demand forecasting with its logical antecedents-segmentation, targeting, and position.Covering marketing research, after students have been exposed to consumer and business markets and segmentation.Integrating planning, implementation, and evaluation to provide a broad strategic context after students have a grasp of what marketing entails.

description.zh: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
description.en: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生管理一項專案時，有關時間及成本的估計、進度表與預算的編列、以及其他監督控制一項專案進行之相關技巧與應用。專案計劃書的發展、專案投資的可行性分析、專案的風險評估、專案的介面管理，以及專案團隊與專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。

The development of project proposal, feasibility study of project investment, project risk assessment, project interface management, and the role of project manager in a project team within an organization will also be discussed.

description.zh: 邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 上ABC三節課(四管三、經管所、最後一哩)(限350人)

name.zh: 國際觀培養-透視台灣展望未來
name.en: Feast for the global perspective-Insight into Taiwan, Outlook on Future

description.zh: 本課程邀請官方組織及企業與莘莘學子們交流，討論台灣各行各業是如何打進國際市場、各行各業的未來展望、如何管理企業並發現新契機，而增加國際競爭實力，佐以台灣產業行銷國際的實際案例，讓同學們更加了解臺灣產業邁向國際化的現況與未來趨勢。
description.en: Government organizations and enterprises will be invited to interact with students in this course. Through the interaction, we will discuss about how the Taiwan enterprises connect with international markets and future development of these enterprises, and how to manage the enterprises for looking for the potential opportunities to raise enterprises' competitiveness. By studying cases of Taiwan enterprises, students are able to have further understanding about the current status of globalization and the future trend of Taiwan enterprises.

notes: 上ABC三節課(四管三、經管所、最後一哩)(限350人)

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理﹙4005032﹚。本課程著重於IC製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
description.en: A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.

description.zh: 本課程針對近年來的預測方法，如MRI法或NeXT法、德菲法等模型進行探討。除了說明技術/市場預測方法的運用邏輯及做法外，也進一步解釋各項技術對相關新產品市場的評估。
description.en: This course teaches the students various updated methods used in forecasting. In addition to some traditional techniques, the MRI, NeXT, and Dephi models will be emphasized. Evaluations and applications of these methods in different business and public sectors will be addressed.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對服務科技管理中相關議題作探討；其中子議題如服務科技管理發展理論背景、創新服務模式、於服務業及製造業之應用、及ICT技術於服務科技管理應用情形等。除理論外，實務個案演練及講解，企業實地參訪及專家講座亦包含。
description.en: 英文概述	The purpose of this course focuses the issues related to service science management, including the sub-issue like the background of service science management, innovative business model, the application of service science management in service and manufacturing industry, and the application of ICT in service science management.  Besides, the case study, field study and practical forum are also included.

name.zh: 創意設計數位學習講座

description.zh: 本課程係作為本校學生進行創意思考與數位學習之平台，提供學生建立創意設計之理論基礎與實務發展之經驗，協助應用數位學習平台與課程討論等方式進行創意發想。透過邀請國內著名之創意設計相關產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，進行經驗分享與傳承，並應用網路學習平台進行教學與學習，以激發學生透過自身生活之經驗，學習創意發展之可能性，開發其創意之潛能。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train the students' creative thinking with interact e-learning environment. This course will stimulate the students' thinking through the speeches of experts on design. The students will learn to combine their life experience with what the experts share and develop creativity.

notes: 9/15(三)於六教B425四設三、創新所、最後一哩合開

description.en: This course aims at developing the working ability of students, then nourishing their professional accomplishment in the near future. The course emphasizes on communication, time management, pressure management, and the orientation in diverse workplace to advance the competitiveness of the students.

notes: 上3節課ABC，技職所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1.以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2.探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3.探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4.學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5.具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

name.zh: 電腦整合實體模型設計

description.zh: 1.實體模型設計簡介與應用2.實體模型設計軟體功能與使用者介面之簡介(簡介構成軟體的各項模組)3.建構繪圖環境(訂置繪圖工具列與草圖顯示內容)4.建構參考幾何(繪製草圖，尺寸標註、產生基準面、曲線、曲面等)5.使用特徵(填料、除料、伸長、掃出、旋轉…等的使用)6.組件的繪製(特徵編輯，處理組件的組態…)7.組合件的處理(處理方式、產生組合件、爆炸圖、模型組態、於零組件中註記)8.鈑金零件9.熔接10.工程圖的處理(訂製工程圖範本、產生工程圖、組件與組合件的視圖)11.模型外觀的處理(材質、顏色、光源)12.輸出與輸入檔案的處理
description.en: 1.	Introduction and Applications of solid modeling2.Introduction of functions and user interface of software for solid modeling3.Create working environoment4.Reference geometry5.Using features6.Working with parts7.Working with assemblies8.Sheet metal9.Weldments10.Create engineering drawing11.Out-looking treatment (materials, color, light source,…)12.Importing and Exporting files

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對電子化企業經營與管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6. 商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究.
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the e-business management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management. 2. The business model. 3. Business reengineering. 4.Enterprise resource planning. 5.Small enterprise e-business management. 6. Channel e-business. 7.Supply chain management. 8.Demand chain management. 9.Collaborative management. 10. Case Study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討服務科技化之發展及產業於此領域應用之分析. 課程包含商務模式, 創新服務流程,  相關技術之發展如Web 2.0, 雲端技術, Google 平台資源,及ICT之發展.
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide  a study on the develpment of servicce science and its industry application.Thse course will include business model, innovation service pocess, related technology like Web 2.0, clouding technology, the resource on Google platform, and ICT development.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 本課程針對近年來的預測方法，如MRI法或NeXT法、德菲法等模型進行探討。除了說明技術/市場預測方法的運用邏輯及做法外，也進一步解釋各項技術對相關新產品市場的評估。
description.en: This course teaches the students various updated methods used in forecasting. In addition to some traditional techniques, the MRI, NeXT, and Dephi models will be emphasized. Evaluations and applications of these methods in different business and public sectors will be addressed.

description.zh: 本課程在教授同學有關企業成長過程的成功邏輯，並熟悉其過程中的挑戰與企業應有的策略因應作為，從而維持其競爭優勢於不墜。本課程分為兩向主要內容︰介紹有關產業分析之工具，以及以所學之分析工具進行產業結構、廠商行為、競爭型態以及產業績效之評估。在產業分析工具方面將介紹結構-行為-績效模型、五例分析模型、價值網絡模型、產業群聚模型等不同分析架構以及其理論基礎和應用方向。在產業分析的應用方面，本課程將以個別產業的產業分析報告或產業內之重要企業的個案，作為介紹產業分析的實例。並透過產業分析的分組實做，逐步帶領同學瞭解製作產業分析報告的過程，包含資料收集、產業界定、競爭議題的界定、分析討論等步驟。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the logic behind a firm`s profitable growth. I also hope that students can realize the challenge a firm may face and the strateigc action a firm may take to sustain competitive advantage in the long term. This course examines markets: their structure, the strategies used by firms involved in the markets, and the overall economic performance of markets. We will start with the discussion of determinants of firm size. Then the course will continue to study behaviors of firms under a not perfect competitive environment and gives way to the application of economics in antitrust theory. While basic theoretical models are included-they are not the sole emphasis. In keeping with the structure-conduct-performance approach to Industrial Organization, emphasis is also placed on the use of industry case studies and applications of antitrust policies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生學習服務設計之基礎知識，包含服務設計原理、服務設計方法、服務設計流程等，並了解目前服務設計之發展現況。透過此課程，學生可以習得基礎服務設計能力，並應用於實務。
description.en: The target of this course is to teach students with regular design training offered by existing design discipline so as to make them equip the abilities to conduct service design. The course starts with the introduction of some basic knowledge, tools, and process of design, and then explores necessary concepts and techniques used for design services. This course is delivered through lecture and hands-on projects, so that students can develop their design attitude and abilities by dealing with real world issues. This course also serves as the basis for students to move forward to take other service design related learning subjects, such as service experience design, interaction design.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 本課程旨在增強學生的「世界文化識力」(cultural literacy) 並體認文學與文化素養在創意應用所扮演的角色，最終的期許是學生能經由此課程觀察到:世界文化的花布斑斕絢麗，儘管形形色色，但不悖離以「文化背景知識」為基礎,以 「溝通能力」(包括: 語言, 圖像, 聲音等等 )為媒介的基本架構。 基礎越深厚， 創造方法與應用模式也越多樣越活潑越有創意。為達到此目標，亦考慮到碩士班學生應具的「世界文化識力」 之廣度與深度，本課程針對文學與文化研究的三大方針分別訂定專門題目來研討。這三大方針是：(1) 時代，(2) 文類，和 (3) 作者。希望學生能在本課程中厚植文學與文化之創意應用的基礎，並能持續該素養之培育。
description.en: This course aims at boosting our students' cultural literacy as well as their awareness in the cultural application of literary knowledge. The ultimate goal is to direct our students' attention to the creative compositions of world culture fabrics, which require "cultural/literary background knowledge" as the base and "language communication skills" as the medium. Taking into account the scope and the depth of cultural literacy required for the students on the MA level, the course focuses on the essential topics drawn from three areas of literary studies: (1) historical periods, (2) genre, and (3) authors. It is eagerly expected that our students would immerse themselves deeply into these cultural literacy trainings so as to lay the foundation for their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計積体電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路佈局的能力,課程內容包念： 1. SOC設計介紹 2. SOC設計流程與工具 3. 以平台為基礎的SOC設計 4. 軟體應體共同設計 5. SIP設計介紹 6. 嵌入式RTOS 7. 混合模式設計 8. SOC測試與驗證 9. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of advanced FPGA system. Therefore, the student has the design capability of advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction to SOC Design 2. SOC Design Flow & Tools 3. Platforms Based SOC Design 4. Hardware/Software Co-design 5. Introduction to SIP Design 6. Embedded RTOS 7. Mixed-mode Design 8. SOC Testing & Verification 9. Case Study

description.zh: 本課程之目的係透過對文化之研究與解析，作為產品設計發展之元素，藉由設計專題之應用，開發出具文化意涵之商品，以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計之創新技能。
description.en: The aim of this course is via the research and analyze the culture, which to be the element of the development of product design. Through the application of design project to develop the cultural product. It could train the students the ability of analyzing the every cultures and the innovation skill of design.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2.雷射基本原理  3.各種雷射介紹  4.雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

description.zh: 在人類文明發展的進程上，曾經不斷地擴張其生存領域，並且在掠奪來的領土或是無人居住的地區興建過全新的城市，這些新興的城市，可能被稱為計畫城市或是殖民城市，與自然生成並且具備風土性格的城市在其空間屬性上有著極大的差異，因而殖民城市研究也有這完全不同的論述方法，在其建築的相關討論上亦然。為了更清楚地瞭解今日我們所存在的世界以及其空間環境，本課程將針對十五世紀以後大航海時期歐洲人進入到非洲、美洲、亞洲海域及陸地，開始了殖民地的新生活，並且開始了以殖民為主要需求的城市規劃，同時投射了其心中的理想城市，以及在歷史過程中的整體實踐，並帶入歐洲的建築思考與營建文明，本課程將探討相關城市與建築的現象。
description.en: In the Human History, we see people struggling for expansion of their living space, desiring of more natural resources.  They took some land, made their own territories, and built their own town, becoming cities.  One might call them ? Planned cities ? or ? colonial cities ?.  Those towns or cities, are totally different in their nature from the towns formed.  Therefore, studies on those cities ought to have some different discourses on them.This seminar will be focus on the phenomena since the epoch of Great Discovery, the coming of European to America, Africa and Asia.  Europeans at time, how they adapted their new life in the colonies, and the founding of new ideal city in their colonies.  The architectural urban phenomena will be the subject of this seminar.
